T03D3807-1:18a-21: / don du bsgrub pa mang ba'i phyir 'od zer

T03D3807-1:18a-24: drug cu drug cu zhes lan gnyis smos pa ni /
T03D3807-1:18a-25: zhabs gnyis la sogs pa sku'i yan lag dang nying
T03D3807-1:18a-26: lag phal cher gnyis gnyis yod pa brtsan par byas
T03D3807-1:18a-27: nas lan gnyis su bzlas te gsungs par rig par
T03D3807-1:18a-28: bya'o // 'od zer de dag kyang don rnam pa gnyis sgrub ste ;
T03D3807-1:18a-29: 'jig rten gyi khams rnams kun tu snang bar byed pa'i don sgrub pa dang /
T03D3807-1:18a-30: sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa'i don sgrub pa'o //
T03D3807-1:18a-31: de la 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
T03D3807-1:18a-32: drug cu po de dag thams cad kyis stong gsum
T03D3807-1:18a-33: gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams
T03D3807-1:18a-34: cad snang bar byas te zhes bya ba la sogs
T03D3807-1:18a-35: pas ni 'jig rten gyi khams rnams kun du snang
T03D3807-1:18a-36: bar bya ba'i don sgrub pa bstan to //
T03D3807-1:18a-37: sems can gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang /
T03D3807-1:18a-38: 'do des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag
T03D3807-1:18a-39: thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par
T03D3807-1:18a-40: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to zhes
T03D3807-1:18a-41: bya bas ni sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa'i
T03D3807-1:18a-43: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ba spu'i sgo
T03D3807-1:18a-44: thams cad nas 'od zer rab tu dgye ba mdzad
T03D3807-1:18a-45: de zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T03D3807-1:18a-46: spu'i khung bu nas 'od zer 'gyed pa'i cho 'phrul bstan te /
T03D3807-1:18b-0: @18b 'od zer de dag kyang don dam pa gnyis sgrub pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T03D3807-1:18b-1: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs
T03D3807-1:18b-2: pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od kyis zhes byang la sogs
T03D3807-1:18b-3: pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od
T03D3807-1:18b-4: zer 'gyed pa'i cho 'phrul bstan pa ste /
T03D3807-1:18b-5: 'od zer de dag kyang don dam pa gnyis sgrub pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T03D3807-1:18b-6: rang bzhin gyi 'od ces bya ba ni sku mdog bzang zhing 'od gsal ba 'phros pa la bya'o //
T03D3807-1:18b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal gyi sgo nas
T03D3807-1:18b-8: ljags kyi dbang po bkram ste zhes bya ba la
T03D3807-1:18b-9: sogs pas ni ljags kyi dbang po las 'od zer
T03D3807-1:18b-11: zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram ste
T03D3807-1:18b-12: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
T03D3807-1:18b-13: 'di thams cad ljags kyi dbang pos khyab par mdzad
T03D3807-1:18b-14: nas zhal 'dzum pa mdzad pas ni /
T03D3807-1:18b-15: bcom ldan 'das chos 'chad pa'i snga ltas bstan to //
T03D3807-1:18b-16: ljags kyi 'od zer de dag thams cad las padma rnams byung ba bstan pas ni /
T03D3807-1:18b-17: chos 'di nyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams padma cis kyang ma gos pa ltar /
T03D3807-1:18b-18: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la nges par 'jug par gyur pa'i mtshan ma bstan to //
T03D3807-1:18b-19: padma de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang
T03D3807-1:18b-20: po bzhugs shing pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang
T03D3807-1:18b-21: ldan pa'i chos 'di nyid ston pa bstan pas ni
T03D3807-1:18b-22: / byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di nyan nyan pa
T03D3807-1:18b-23: de dag padma kha phye zhing rgyas pa bzhin du
T03D3807-1:18b-24: / blo rgyas te / bla na med pa yang
T03D3807-1:18b-25: dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sangs rgyas nas
T03D3807-1:18b-26: / blo rgyas te / ; phyogs phyogs su pha
T03D3807-1:18b-27: rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos 'di
T03D3807-1:18b-28: nyid 'chad par 'gyur ba'i snga ltas bstan to //
T03D3807-1:18b-29: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan seng ge'i khri
T03D3807-1:18b-30: de la bzhugs bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi ting nge
T03D3807-1:18b-31: 'dzin seng ge rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba
T03D3807-1:18b-32: la mnyam par gzhag ste zhes bya ba la sogs
T03D3807-1:18b-33: pas ni seng ge rnam par rol pa zhes bya
T03D3807-1:18b-34: ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi cho 'phrul bstan te /
T03D3807-1:18b-35: cho 'phrul 'di yang snod kyi 'jig rten bzang zhing bde bar byi dor bya ba dang /
T03D3807-1:18b-36: sems can gyi 'jig rten la phan gdags pa dang rnam pa gnyis su bstan te /
T03D3807-1:19a-1: rten bzang zhing bde bar byi dor bya ba'i cho 'phrul ni /
T03D3807-1:19a-2: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
T03D3807-1:19a-3: 'di rnam pa drug tu g-yos te zhes bya ba
T03D3807-1:19a-4: nas sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde
T03D3807-1:19a-5: ba skyed par gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gyis
T03D3807-1:19a-6: bstan te / rnam pa drug tu g-yos pa ni g-yos pa dang /
T03D3807-1:19a-11: shig shig ces zer ba rnams te /
T03D3807-1:19a-12: re re la yang drag dal rnam pa gsum gsum ste /
T03D3807-1:19a-13: dang po dal bus g-yos pa la g-yos pa zhes bya'o//
T03D3807-1:19a-14: de'i 'og tu 'bring du g-yos pa la rab tu g-yos pa zhes bya'o //
T03D3807-1:19a-15: de'i 'og tu de bas kyang drag tu g-yos pa la kun du g-yos pa zhes bya ste /
T03D3807-1:19a-16: lhag ma rnams la yang de bzhin du sbyar ro //
T03D3807-1:19a-17: mtha' mtho na ni dbus dma'/
T03D3807-1:19a-18: dbus mtho na ni dbus dma'/
T03D3807-1:19a-19: dbus mtho na ni mtha' dma' zhes bya ba ni
T03D3807-1:19a-20: de ltar rnam pa drug tu g-yos pa nyid kyi
T03D3807-1:19a-21: tshe / mtha' dang dbus mthon dman du gyur pa
T03D3807-1:19a-22: la bya bas rnam pa drug tu g-yos pa'i nang
T03D3807-1:19a-23: du gtogs te logs shig tu mi bgrang ngo //
T03D3807-1:19a-24: dal bus bags kyis nyams su bde ba dang /
T03D3807-1:19a-25: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba
T03D3807-1:19a-26: skyed par gyur to zhes bya bas ni de ltar
T03D3807-1:19a-27: rnam pa drug tu g-yos pa'i tshe yang /
T03D3807-1:19a-28: sems can rnams sdang [?] zhing skrag pa la sogs
T03D3807-1:19a-29: par mi 'gyur bar ri dang sa gzhi dang rtsi
T03D3807-1:19a-30: shing la sogs pa yang la 'jam zhing snum pa
T03D3807-1:19a-31: dang nyams dga' bar gyur to zhes bstan to //
T03D3807-1:19a-32: de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig
T03D3807-1:19a-33: la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
T03D3807-1:19a-34: khams 'di na / sems can dmyal ba dang /
T03D3807-1:19a-35: byol song gi skye gnas dang /
T03D3807-1:19a-40: log par ltung ba gang ji snyed yod pa de
T03D3807-1:19a-41: dag thams cad rgyun chad par gyur te zhes bya
T03D3807-1:19a-42: ba la sogs pas ni sems can gyi 'jig rten
T03D3807-1:19a-43: la phan gdags pa'i cho 'phrul bstan te /
T03D3807-1:19a-44: sems can gyi 'jig rten la phan gdags pa'i cho
T03D3807-1:19a-45: 'phrul de yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
T03D3807-1:19a-46: rten gyi khams 'di'i sems can ngan song rgyud gsum
T03D3807-1:19b-0: la sogs pa @19b na gnas pa dang /
T03D3807-1:19b-1: phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams gang+g'a'i klung gi bye
T03D3807-1:19b-2: ma snyed kyi sems can rnams ngan song rgyud gsum
T03D3807-1:19b-3: la sogs pa na gnas pa ngan song gi sdug
T03D3807-1:19b-4: bsngal nas thar cing mtho ris kyi bde ba myong
T03D3807-1:19b-6: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmus long dang /
T03D3807-1:19b-7: 'on pa la sogs pa'i mi bde ba dang bcas
T03D3807-1:19b-8: pa rnams kyang mi bde ba de dag las thar
T03D3807-1:19b-9: pa dang / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las dang /
T03D3807-1:19b-10: 'tsho ba mi dge ba rnams kyang dge bar gyur pa dang /
T03D3807-1:19b-11: sems can thams cad kyang gcig la gcig pha ma dang /
T03D3807-1:19b-12: phu nu la sogs pa dang 'dra bar sems mnyam par gyur pa dang /
T03D3807-1:19b-13: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan zhing tshangs par spyod pa dang /
T03D3807-1:19b-15: nyes pa'i skyon med pa dang /
T03D3807-1:19b-16: mi dge ba'i rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba dang /
T03D3807-1:19b-17: sbyin pa la sogs pa'i dge ba'i shes rab dang ldan par gyur pa ste /
T03D3807-1:19b-18: de la mi khom pa zhes bya ba ni dam
T03D3807-1:19b-19: pa'i chos mngon par rtogs shing 'phags pa'i sa thob
T03D3807-1:19b-20: par bya ba'i skabs dang skal ba med pa la
T03D3807-1:19b-21: bya'o // mi khom pa de yang rnam pa brgyad de /
T03D3807-1:19b-23: sems can dmyal bar skyes pa dang /
T03D3807-1:19b-24: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa dang /
T03D3807-1:19b-25: yi dags su skyes pa dang /
T03D3807-1:19b-26: mtha' 'khob kyi kla klor skyes pa dang /
T03D3807-1:19b-28: 'du shes med pa'i srid par skyes pa dang /
T03D3807-1:19b-31: lkugs pa la sogs par gyur pa dang /
T03D3807-1:19b-32: log par lta bar gyur pa dang /
T03D3807-1:19b-33: sangs rgyas med pa'i bskal pa la skyes pa rnams so //
T03D3807-1:19b-34: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gdan seng ge'i khri de nyid la bzhugs pas 'di lta ste /
T03D3807-1:19b-35: dper na nyi ma bsgribs pa med pa nam mkha'i
T03D3807-1:19b-36: dbyings yongs su dag pa la 'dug pa'am zla ba
T03D3807-1:19b-37: nya ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar zhes bya ba nas de
T03D3807-1:19b-38: bzhin du bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten lha
T03D3807-1:19b-39: dang bcas pa / dbang po dang bcas pa /
T03D3807-1:19b-41: gtsang ma'i gnas dang bcas pa zil gyis gnon par zhugs shing /
T03D3807-1:20a-1: mdzes shing lham me lhan ni lhang nge'o zhes bya
T03D3807-1:20a-2: ba'i bar gyis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi gzi brjid
T03D3807-1:20a-3: chen po'i yon tan bstan pa ste /
T03D3807-1:20a-4: nyi ma dang zla bas skar ma la sogs pa'i 'od can thams cad zil gyis mnan pa dang /
T03D3807-1:20a-5: ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyis ri gzhan rnams zil gyis mnan pa bzhin du /
T03D3807-1:20a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'jig rten lha dang bcas
T03D3807-1:20a-7: pa rnams zil gyis mnan te bzhugs so zhes bstan
T03D3807-1:20a-8: te / 'od kyis ni tshangs pa'i 'od bsnyems pa rnams zil gyis mnan no //
T03D3807-1:20a-9: sku mdog gis ni brgya byin la sogs pa'i lha
T03D3807-1:20a-10: mdog bzang po bsnyems pa rnams zil gyis mnan to
T03D3807-1:20a-11: // gzi brjid kyis ni bdud dang mu stegs can rnams zil gyis mnan to //
T03D3807-1:20a-12: dpal gyis ni mi rnams zil gyis mnan te bzhugs so //
T03D3807-1:20a-13: 'od dang ldan pas ni mdzes so //
T03D3807-1:20a-14: sku mdog dang ldan pas ni lham me'o //
T03D3807-1:20a-15: gzi brjid dang ldan pas ni lhan ne'o //
T03D3807-1:20a-16: dpal dang ldan pas ni lhang nges bzhugs so zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T03D3807-1:20a-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi stong gsum gyi stong
T03D3807-1:20a-18: chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir bcom ldan 'das
T03D3807-1:20a-19: kyi rang bzhin gyi sku ci 'dra ba de bzhin
T03D3807-1:20a-20: du bstan to zhes bya ba nas /
T03D3807-1:20a-21: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi thams cad dang /
T03D3807-1:20a-22: lha thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta
T03D3807-1:20a-23: bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du
T03D3807-1:20a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs
T03D3807-1:20a-26: shing chos bstan to snyam mo zhes bya ba'i bar
T03D3807-1:20a-27: gyis ni byin gyi rlabs kyi cho 'phrul bstan te
T03D3807-1:20a-28: / byin gyi rlabs kyi cho 'phrul zhes bya ba
T03D3807-1:20a-29: yang bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis stong
T03D3807-1:20a-30: gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
T03D3807-1:20a-31: lha dang mi rnams de bzhin gshegs pa mthong nas
T03D3807-1:20a-33: mchod pa sna tshogs byed pa dang /
T03D3807-1:20a-34: mchod pa byas pa'i me tog la sogs pa de
T03D3807-1:20a-35: dag kyang de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi
T03D3807-1:20a-36: dbu'i steng gi nam mkha' la me tog la sogs
T03D3807-1:20a-38: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam du gnas par gyur pa dang /
T03D3807-1:20b-0: @20b khang pa brtsegs pa de las kyang me tog
T03D3807-1:20b-1: dang dar gyi lda ldi mang po 'phyang bar gyur
T03D3807-1:20b-2: pa dang / me tog dang dar gyi lda ldi de dag dang /
T03D3807-1:20b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba gser gyi kha dog lta bu des kyang /
T03D3807-1:20b-4: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
T03D3807-1:20b-5: 'di dang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+g'a'i klung
T03D3807-1:20b-6: gi bye ma snyed shin tu mdzad par khyab cing
T03D3807-1:20b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi sku gcig pu bstan kyang /
T03D3807-1:20b-10: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha la sogs pa 'dod pa'i khams dang /
T03D3807-1:20b-11: gzugs kyi khams kyi lha rnams dang /
T03D3807-1:20b-14: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi thams cad dang /
T03D3807-1:20b-15: lha thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta
T03D3807-1:20b-16: bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas thams cad kyang
T03D3807-1:20b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs
T03D3807-1:20b-18: shing chos ston to snyam du sems par byin gyis
T03D3807-1:20b-19: brlabs pa la byin gyi rlabs kyi cho 'phrul zhes
T03D3807-1:20b-20: bya'o // de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog
T03D3807-1:20b-21: mi shes pa zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs
T03D3807-1:20b-22: pa'i rang bzhin gyi sku de mdog bzang zhing gzi
T03D3807-1:20b-24: mthong na skyo mi shes shing phyi phyir je bzang je bzang snang ba la bya'o //
T03D3807-1:20b-25: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan seng ge'i
T03D3807-1:20b-26: khri la bzhugs bzhin du 'od rab tu dgye ba
T03D3807-1:20b-27: mdzad de zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni chos
T03D3807-1:20b-29: chos snang ba'i cho 'phrul de yang rnam pa gnyis te ;
T03D3807-1:20b-30: 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byed pa'i cho 'phrul dang /
T03D3807-1:20b-32: de la yang 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen
T03D3807-1:20b-33: po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu snang bar
T03D3807-1:20b-34: gyur to zhes bya ba nas /
T03D3807-1:20b-35: steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+g'a'i klung
T03D3807-1:20b-36: gi bye ma snyed po de dag na sems can
T03D3807-1:20b-37: gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang stong
T03D3807-1:20b-38: gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
T03D3807-1:20b-39: na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
T03D3807-1:20b-40: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub
T03D3807-1:20b-41: pa de dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa
T03D3807-1:21a-1: 'khor dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur
T03D3807-1:21a-2: to zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni 'jig rten gyi
T03D3807-1:21a-3: khams snang bar byed pa'i cho 'phrul bstan pa ste
T03D3807-1:21a-4: / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od rab tu bkye ba
T03D3807-1:21a-5: mdzad pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
T03D3807-1:21a-7: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rab tu snang bar gyur te /
T03D3807-1:21a-8: snang ba des 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na
T03D3807-1:21a-9: gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyis stong gsum gyi stong
T03D3807-1:21a-10: chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang /
T03D3807-1:21a-11: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+g'a'i klung gi bye
T03D3807-1:21a-12: ma snyed dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
T03D3807-1:21a-13: 'das rnams mthong bas dga' ba dang dad pa skyes
T03D3807-1:21a-14: te / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
T03D3807-1:21a-15: na bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa bzhugs pa la
T03D3807-1:21a-16: mchod cing phyag 'tshal du 'ong 'dod par gyur to
T03D3807-1:21a-17: te / // de nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig
T03D3807-1:21a-18: rten gyi khams gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das
T03D3807-1:21a-19: pa kun gyi pha rol na 'jig rten gyi khams
T03D3807-1:21a-20: rin chen yod pa zhes bya ba yod de zhes
T03D3807-1:21a-21: bya ba la sogs pas ni 'khor sdud pa'i cho
T03D3807-1:21a-22: te / // 'phrul bstan te / gong du smos
T03D3807-1:21a-23: pa'i rim pas sa g-yos pa dang 'od snang ba
T03D3807-1:21a-25: 'od des mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na /
T03D3807-1:21a-26: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa bzhugs pa'i sku blta
T03D3807-1:21a-27: na chog mi shes pa de phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
T03D3807-1:21a-28: gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
T03D3807-1:21a-29: kyis gzigs nas / bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la phyag bya ba dang /
T03D3807-1:21a-30: bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir mi mjed kyi 'jig rten
T03D3807-1:21a-31: gyi khams 'dir 'dus shing gshegs par bya ba'i phyir
T03D3807-1:21a-32: / 'od rab tu dgye bar mdzad pa nyid la 'khor sdud pa'i cho 'phrul zhes bya'o //
T03D3807-1:21a-33: 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'od zer gyis bskul te /
T03D3807-1:21a-34: mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gshegs pa yang /
T03D3807-1:21a-35: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa sngon byang chub sems dpa' mdzad pa'i tshe /
T03D3807-1:21a-36: byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang smon lam gcig tu btab cing /
T03D3807-1:21b-0: byang chub sems dpa'i @21b spyod pa mthun par spyod
T03D3807-1:21b-1: spyod pa'i rgyus bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas gdul
T03D3807-1:21b-2: zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen mdzad par gyur pa'i phyir
T03D3807-1:21b-3: / byang chub sems dpa' de dag bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i spyan sngar gshegs par gyur to //
T03D3807-1:21b-4: shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+g'a'i klung
T03D3807-1:21b-5: gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol
T03D3807-1:21b-6: na zhes bya ba la ni 'jig rten gyi khams
T03D3807-1:21b-7: mtha' yas pa'i phyir pha rol gyi mtha' bltar med
T03D3807-1:21b-8: mod kyi / 'jig rten gyi khams gang tshun chad
T03D3807-1:21b-9: kyi byang chub sems dpa' 'dir gshegs pa rnams kyi
T03D3807-1:21b-10: mtha' ma la kun gyi pha rol zhes bya'o //
T03D3807-1:21b-11: kun gyi pha rol zhes smos pas de tshun chad
T03D3807-1:21b-12: kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i byang chub
T03D3807-1:21b-13: sems dpa' thams cad gshegs par blta'o //
T03D3807-1:21b-14: bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong zhes bya ba la yongs su
T03D3807-1:21b-15: mya ngan las ma 'das shing srog gi dbang po'i
T03D3807-1:21b-16: rgyun la bzhugs pa'i phyir bzhugs zhes bya'o //
T03D3807-1:21b-17: sku la snyun mi mnga' ba'i phyir 'tsho zhes bya'o //
T03D3807-1:21b-18: glo bur gyi snyun mi mnga' bas sku tshe'i mnga'
T03D3807-1:21b-19: thang bzhin du tshe'i bar chad mi 'byung ba'i phyir
T03D3807-1:21b-20: skyong zhes bya'o // yang rnam pa gcig tu na
T03D3807-1:21b-21: chos kyi sku ni gnas pa'i rang bzhin pas chos
T03D3807-1:21b-22: kyi sku'i rang bzhin du bzhugs pa la bzhugs zhes
T03D3807-1:21b-23: skyong zhes bya'o // bya'o // longs spyod rdzogs pa'i
T03D3807-1:21b-24: sku ni byang chub sems dpa' yongs su dag pa
T03D3807-1:21b-25: skyong zhes bya'o // bya'o // rnams la / chos
T03D3807-1:21b-26: dang zang zing gi longs spyod kyis 'tsho ba'i phyir
T03D3807-1:21b-27: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i tshul du bzhugs pa la
T03D3807-1:21b-28: skyong zhes bya'o // bya'o // rnams la / 'tsho
T03D3807-1:21b-29: zhes bya'o // sprul pa'i sku ni sems can yongs
T03D3807-1:21b-30: su ma dag pa rnams skyong ba'i phyir sprul pa'i
T03D3807-1:21b-31: sku'i tshul du bzhugs pa la skyong zhes bya'o //
T03D3807-1:21b-32: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag
T03D3807-1:21b-33: kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur ba zhes bya ba
T03D3807-1:21b-34: la bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i zham 'bring na
T03D3807-1:21b-35: bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag las kha
T03D3807-1:21b-36: cig ni rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags chung bas sems
T03D3807-1:21b-37: dang po bskyed pa nas tshangs par spyod pa la
T03D3807-1:21b-38: gnas shing sa bcu yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa
T03D3807-1:21b-39: dang / kha cig ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa
T03D3807-1:21b-40: brgyad pa yan chad la gnas pa thob pas rtsol
T03D3807-1:22a-1: rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral te /
T03D3807-1:22a-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rgyal po'i rgyal
T03D3807-1:22a-3: tshab tu dbang bskur bar 'os pa'i phyir rgyal po'i
T03D3807-1:22a-4: sras gzhon nu rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur bar 'os
T03D3807-1:22a-5: pa dang 'dra bar chos kyi rgyal tshab kyi sa
T03D3807-1:22a-6: la gnas pa'i phyir gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya'o
T03D3807-1:22a-7: // padmo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las
T03D3807-1:22a-8: byung ba gser gyi kha dog can rnams bskur ba
T03D3807-1:22a-9: // dang / snyun gsol spring ba ni ma 'ongs
T03D3807-1:22a-10: pa'i dus kyi sems can rnams nga rgyal dang phrag
T03D3807-1:22a-12: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang gcig la gcig 'di ltar sri zhu dang /
T03D3807-1:22a-13: gus pa mdzad na bdag cag gis de ltar bya
T03D3807-1:22a-14: ba lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam du sems shing
T03D3807-1:22a-15: dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3807-1:22a-16: yang rnam ba gcig tu na bcom ldan 'das sh'akya
T03D3807-1:22a-17: thub pa'i 'khor thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams
T03D3807-1:22a-18: gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs par
T03D3807-1:22a-19: yid ches par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3807-1:22a-20: rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod
T03D3807-1:22a-21: bar spyod cig ces bya ba ni mi mjed kyi
T03D3807-1:22a-22: 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snyigs ma lnga dang ldan
T03D3807-1:22a-23: pa'i phyir / bag yod par spyod cig ces gdams shing rjes su bstan pa mdzad do //
T03D3807-1:22a-24: de la snyigs ma lnga ni nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma dang /
T03D3807-1:22a-29: de la nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma ni /
T03D3807-1:22a-30: mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'dod chags dang /
T03D3807-1:22a-32: gti mug la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams shas
T03D3807-1:22a-33: che bas mi dge ba bcu'i las la sogs pa
T03D3807-1:22a-34: sdig pa'i chos mang du spyod pa dang /
T03D3807-1:22a-35: de'i rgyus sems can dmyal ba dang /
T03D3807-1:22a-37: yi dags kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba mang pa dang /
T03D3807-1:22a-38: mir skyes na yang sdug bsngal mang po dang ldan pa mang du snang ste /
T03D3807-1:22a-39: de dag ni nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma las gyur to //
T03D3807-1:22a-40: dus kyi snyigs ma ni mi mjed kyi 'jig rten
T03D3807-1:22a-41: gyi khams 'dir bar bar du mu ge'i sdug bsngal
T03D3807-1:22b-0: bar bar du ni nad kyi sdug bsngal brnag mi bzod @22b pa rnams 'byung /
T03D3807-1:22b-1: bar bar du ni sems can rnams gcig la gcig
T03D3807-1:22b-2: 'tshe zhing gnod pa byed pa'i dbang gis 'thab cing
T03D3807-1:22b-4: bar bar du ni chu'i 'jigs pa 'byung /
T03D3807-1:22b-5: bar bar du ni me'i 'jigs pa 'byung /
T03D3807-1:22b-6: bar bar du ni rlung gi 'jigs pa 'byung ste /
T03D3807-1:22b-7: de lta bu'i 'dus ngan pa mang du 'byung ba la dus kyi snyigs ma zhes bya'o //
T03D3807-1:22b-8: tshe'i snyigs ma ni mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi
T03D3807-1:22b-9: khams 'di'i sems can rnams kyi tshe la nges pa
T03D3807-1:22b-10: med de / bar bar du ni tshe'i tshad dpag tu med /
T03D3807-1:22b-11: bar bar du ni tshe lo bcu par 'gyur /
T03D3807-1:22b-12: de la yang nges pa med de /
T03D3807-1:22b-13: kha cig ni ma'i mngal nas tshe 'pho /
T03D3807-1:22b-14: kha cig ni skyes ma thag tu tshe 'pho /
T03D3807-1:22b-15: kha cig ni lang tsho'i dus la bab na tshe 'pho /
T03D3807-1:22b-16: kha cig ni dar la bab na tshe 'pho /
T03D3807-1:22b-17: kha cig ni rga nas tshe 'pho ste /
T03D3807-1:22b-18: de ltar tshe la nges pa med pas de'i rgyus mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang ;
T03D3807-1:22b-20: yid mi bde ba la sogs pa rnam pa mang po 'byung ste /
T03D3807-1:22b-21: de ltar sems can rnams kyi tshe la nges pa med de /
T03D3807-1:22b-22: tshe dus ngan pa'i phyir tshe'i snyigs ma zhes bya'o //
T03D3807-1:22b-23: lta ba'i snyigs ma ni log par lta ba la
T03D3807-1:22b-24: sogs pa mu stegs can gyi lta ba ngan pa
T03D3807-1:22b-25: dge ba thams cad rtsa ba nas 'byin pa rnams
T03D3807-1:22b-26: kyang mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mang
T03D3807-1:22b-27: du 'byung ste / lta ba de dag gis byang
T03D3807-1:22b-28: chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa'i skal
T03D3807-1:22b-29: ba med par 'gyur ba'i phyir lta ba'i snyigs ma
T03D3807-1:22b-30: du 'byung ste / zhes bya'o // sems can gyi
T03D3807-1:22b-31: snyigs ma ni mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
T03D3807-1:22b-32: 'di'i sems can rnams phal cher skur pa 'debs pa'i
T03D3807-1:22b-33: ngang [?] tshul can ma dad pa /
T03D3807-1:22b-34: mkhas pa dang mi mthun pa skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis shin tu smad pa /
T03D3807-1:22b-35: dam pa'i chos kyi snod du ma gyur pa sems
T03D3807-1:22b-36: can gyi rgyud sa tsha sgo can lta bur gyur
T03D3807-1:22b-37: pas dge ba'i lo thog mi 'phel ba phal che
T03D3807-1:22b-38: ba'i phyir sems can gyi snyigs ma zhes bya ste
T03D3807-1:22b-39: / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snyigs
T03D3807-1:22b-40: ma de lnga dang ldan zhing skyon che ba'i phyir
T03D3807-1:22b-41: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gzhan nas
T03D3807-1:22b-42: 'dir 'dong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sangs
T03D3807-1:23a-0: / rgyas @23a * // // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
T03D3807-1:23a-1: 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems
T03D3807-1:23a-2: dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar
T03D3807-1:23a-3: dka' ba yin gyis der nyams par gyur ta re
T03D3807-1:23a-4: zhes bya bas ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir bag
T03D3807-1:23a-5: yod par spyad par bya ba'i rgyu bstan te /
T03D3807-1:23a-6: 'jig rten gyi khams de de ltar skyon che bar ma zad kyi /
T03D3807-1:23a-7: der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can
T03D3807-1:23a-8: gdul dka' ba rnams 'dul 'dul bas thabs mkhas shing
T03D3807-1:23a-9: mkhyen pa rgya che ba'i phyir mgu dka' ba yin
T03D3807-1:23a-10: gyis / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis ma
T03D3807-1:23a-11: khrel bar gyis shig ces gdams shing rjes su bstan
T03D3807-1:23a-12: gyis / pa mdzad do // rim gror bya ba dang /
T03D3807-1:23a-14: phu dud du bya ba dang mchod par byed cing
T03D3807-1:23a-15: zhes bya ba ni lus dang ngag dang yid gsum
T03D3807-1:23a-16: gyi sgo nas gus shing bsti stang phyed pa'i rnam
T03D3807-1:23a-21: bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes bya ba ni glo bur gyi snyun mi mnga' zhes bya'o //
T03D3807-1:23a-25: snyun gyi rkyen sman rnams dang ldan pa la gnod pa ma mchis pa zhes bya'o //
T03D3807-1:23a-26: bgres pa la sogs pas sku zor lci bar ma gyur pa la zo mdog bde ba zhes bya'o //
T03D3807-1:23a-27: snyun mi mnga' ba dang gnod pa ma mchis pa
T03D3807-1:23a-28: dang zo mdog bde ba gsum char dang ldan pa'i
T03D3807-1:23a-29: 'bras bu ni sku nyams dang ldan zhing bde ba
T03D3807-1:23a-31: shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor sdud
T03D3807-1:23a-32: pa'i cho 'phrul ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin du
T03D3807-1:23a-33: / lho phyogs la sogs pa steng gi phyogs kyi
T03D3807-1:23a-34: 'jig rten gyi khams la thug gi bar du phyogs
T03D3807-1:23a-35: thams cad la yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o
T03D3807-1:23a-36: / // de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam
T03D3807-1:23a-37: thang cig la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
T03D3807-1:23a-38: rten gyi khams 'di rin po che'i rang bzhin du
T03D3807-1:23a-39: kun nas gnas par gyur te zhes bya ba la
T03D3807-1:23b-1: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bshad pa'i mthu dang /
T03D3807-1:23b-2: byin che ba bstan pa dang /
T03D3807-1:23b-3: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas gshegs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa dad pa dang /
T03D3807-1:23b-4: mos pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi byin
T03D3807-1:23b-5: gyi rlabs kyis mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
T03D3807-1:23b-6: 'di rin po che'i rang bzhin du gnas par gyur
T03D3807-1:23b-7: cing // rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa 'jig rten
T03D3807-1:23b-8: gyi khams padmo can zhes bya ba sangs rgyas kyi
T03D3807-1:23b-9: zhing yongs su dag pa dang 'dra bar gyur pa
T03D3807-1:23b-10: cing // bstan to // shes rab kyi pha rol
T03D3807-1:23b-11: tu phyin pa 'bum pa rgya cher bshad pa las
T03D3807-1:23b-12: cing // bstan to // / gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o /
T03D3807-1:23b-14: // / de ltar gleng gzhi'i le'u bstan nas /
T03D3807-1:23b-15: de'i 'og tu gzhung gi don nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
T03D3807-1:23b-16: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten gyi lha dang bcas pa /
T03D3807-1:23b-18: dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa /
T03D3807-1:23b-19: lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang bcas pa mang po tshogs pa dang /
T03D3807-1:23b-20: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phal cher
T03D3807-1:23b-21: gzhon nur gyur pa mang po de dag 'dus par
T03D3807-1:23b-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra
T03D3807-1:23b-24: dva ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba
T03D3807-1:23b-26: theg pa chen po'i mchog bstan pa 'di byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal te /
T03D3807-1:23b-27: skabs dbye ba'i rigs pa las sh'a ri'i bu la bka' stsal te /
T03D3807-1:23b-28: skabs phye ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3807-1:23b-29: phyin pa 'di theg pa gsum char gyi spyir thun
T03D3807-1:23b-30: mong du bstan pa yin te /
T03D3807-1:23b-31: de ltar cis mngon zhe na /
T03D3807-1:23b-32: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las thams cad shes pa nyid dang /
T03D3807-1:23b-33: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /
T03D3807-1:23b-34: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang gsum char rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir te /
T03D3807-1:23b-35: gal te byang chub sems dpa' 'ga' zhig la bka' stsal te /
T03D3807-1:23b-37: theg pa chung du pa dang /
T03D3807-1:23b-38: skye bo gzhan dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3807-1:23b-39: phyin pa zab mo 'di bdag cag gi spyod yul
T03D3807-1:23b-40: ma yin no snyam nas 'bad cing rtsol bar mi
T03D3807-1:24a-2: theg pa chung du ba la sogs pa skye bo
T03D3807-1:24a-3: thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3807-1:24a-4: pa 'di sh'a ri'i bu'i spyod yul du gyur pa
T03D3807-1:24a-5: dang sbyar na bdag cag thams cad kyi spyod yul
T03D3807-1:24a-6: du yang 'gyur ro snyam nas theg pa chung du
T03D3807-1:24a-7: pa la sogs pa skye bo thams cad kyang 'bad
T03D3807-1:24a-8: cing rtsol bar 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir /
T03D3807-1:24a-9: sh'a ri'i bu la bka' stsal te /
T03D3807-1:24a-11: rnam pa gcig tu na de bzhin gshegs pas chos
T03D3807-1:24a-12: bstan pa 'di gsung gcig gis kyang skye bo thams
T03D3807-1:24a-13: cad kyi yid dang mthun par chos bstan pa sna
T03D3807-1:24a-14: tshogs so sor bstan pa khyab par 'byung ste /
T03D3807-1:24a-15: skye bo de dag kyang so so nas de bzhin
T03D3807-1:24a-16: gshegs pa ni bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing
T03D3807-1:24a-17: chos ston to snyam du sems pa dang sbyar na
T03D3807-1:24a-18: / thams cad la bka' stsal te skabs phye mod kyi /
T03D3807-1:24a-19: 'on kyang chos sdud par byed pa rnams kyis de
T03D3807-1:24a-20: snyed cig char la bsdur mi rung bas skye bo
T03D3807-1:24a-21: thams cad kyi spyod yul du 'gyur ba sh'a ri'i
T03D3807-1:24a-23: skabs phye ba gcig pu smos nas chos bsdu ba byas par rig par bya'o //
T03D3807-1:24a-24: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bshad pa ni /
T03D3807-1:24a-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo gsum gyis bstan te /
T03D3807-1:24a-26: mgo smos pas go ba dang /
T03D3807-1:24a-27: rnam par spros nas go ba dang /
T03D3807-1:24a-29: 'dul ba rnam pa gsum las brtsams te /
T03D3807-1:24a-32: rgyas par bstan pa'i sgo ste /
T03D3807-1:24a-33: sgo gsum dang rnam grangs bcu gcig gis bshad de /
T03D3807-1:24a-34: de la rnam grangs bcu gcig ni dang po sh'a
T03D3807-1:24a-35: ri'i bu la bka' stsal te bshad pa gcig dang
T03D3807-1:24a-36: / rab 'byor la bka' stsal te bshad pa lnga dang /
T03D3807-1:24a-37: brgya byin la bka' stsal te bshad pa gnyis dang /
T03D3807-1:24a-38: byams pa la bka' stsal te bshad pa gnyis dang /
T03D3807-1:24a-39: byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags dang rtag tu du'i
T03D3807-1:24a-40: gtam glengs nas gnas brtan kun dga' bo la bka'
T03D3807-1:24a-41: stsal te yongs su gtad pa gcig dang 'di dag
T03D3807-1:24a-42: ni rnam grangs bcu gcig go //
T03D3807-1:24a-43: de la mgo smos pas go ba rnams kyi phyir mdor bshad pa gsungs pa /
T03D3807-1:24b-0: sh'a ri'i bu 'di la @24b byang chub sems dpa'
T03D3807-1:24b-1: sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad rnam pa thams
T03D3807-1:24b-2: cad du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod
T03D3807-1:24b-3: pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
T03D3807-1:24b-4: brtson par bya'o zhes bya bas de la sha ra
T03D3807-1:24b-5: dva ti'i bu zhes bya ba ni /
T03D3807-1:24b-6: gnas brtan sh'a ri'i bu'i ma'i ming las dras te bos pa'o //

T03D3807-1:31a-4: yang dag pa'i don ma yin par yongs su shes
T03D3807-1:31a-5: par bya ste / don dam par brjod du med
T03D3807-1:31a-6: pa ni dran pa dang shes rab gnyis kyi spyod
T03D3807-1:31a-7: yul ma yin pas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i
T03D3807-1:31a-8: mtshan nyid don dam par yod pa ma yin par
T03D3807-1:31a-9: par bya ste / rtogs nas / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te /
T03D3807-1:31a-10: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed ces bya'o //
T03D3807-1:31a-11: de bas na 'bum pa 'di nyid las kyang /
T03D3807-1:31a-12: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T03D3807-1:31a-13: yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T03D3807-1:31a-14: brtson 'grus kyis dge ba bskyed cing sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams spong bas na /
T03D3807-1:31a-15: yang dag pa'i spong ba bzhi zhes bya ste /
T03D3807-1:31a-16: de yang sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skye ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed /
T03D3807-1:31a-19: sems rab tu 'dzin to zhes bya ba dang /
T03D3807-1:31a-20: sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang
T03D3807-1:31a-21: ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed ces bya ba la sogs
T03D3807-1:31a-22: pa dang / dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams
T03D3807-1:31a-23: bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed ces bya ba la
T03D3807-1:31a-24: pa dang / sogs pa dang / dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang /
T03D3807-1:31a-27: yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed /
T03D3807-1:31a-30: sems rab tu 'dzin to zhes bya'o //
T03D3807-1:31a-31: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par
T03D3807-1:31a-32: bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin
T03D3807-1:31a-33: spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi
T03D3807-1:31a-34: rkang pa dang / sems kyi ting nge 'dzin spong
T03D3807-1:31a-35: ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
T03D3807-1:31a-36: rkang pa dang / pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi
T03D3807-1:31a-37: ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i
T03D3807-1:31a-39: dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang
T03D3807-1:31a-40: ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa sgom pa ste
T03D3807-1:31b-1: 'byor pa chen po thob par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang /
T03D3807-1:31b-2: rten dang gzhi yin pas rkang pa dang 'dra ba'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa zhes bya'o //
T03D3807-1:31b-3: dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes bya ba ni dad pa'i dbang po dang /
T03D3807-1:31b-6: ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /
T03D3807-1:31b-7: shes rab kyi dbang po rnams te /
T03D3807-1:31b-8: dad pa la sogs pa 'di dag gi dbang gis
T03D3807-1:31b-9: zag pa med pa'i chos nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i
T03D3807-1:31b-11: stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T03D3807-1:31b-12: dad pa la sogs pa'i dbang po lnga po de
T03D3807-1:31b-13: dag nyid goms pa'i mthus nyon mongs pa'i phyogs rnams
T03D3807-1:31b-14: kyis zil gyis mi non te /
T03D3807-1:31b-15: mthu dang ldan par gyur pa la stobs lnga zhes bya'o //
T03D3807-1:31b-16: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T03D3807-1:31b-17: dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
T03D3807-1:31b-18: chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
T03D3807-1:31b-19: brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
T03D3807-1:31b-20: dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
T03D3807-1:31b-21: shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
T03D3807-1:31b-22: ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
T03D3807-1:31b-23: btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste /
T03D3807-1:31b-24: sa dang po la byang chub kyi rang bzhin gyis chos nyid rtogs par byed pa'i dus na /
T03D3807-1:31b-25: dran pa la sogs pa 'di rnams rgyu dang grogs
T03D3807-1:31b-26: su gyur pa'i phyir byang chub kyi yan lag ces
T03D3807-1:31b-27: bya'o // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T03D3807-1:31b-28: yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /
T03D3807-1:31b-29: yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /
T03D3807-1:31b-31: yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /
T03D3807-1:31b-33: yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /
T03D3807-1:31b-34: yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /
T03D3807-1:31b-35: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams te /
T03D3807-1:31b-36: sa dang po thob nas sa bcu'i bar du bsgom pa'i lam la 'jug pa'i tshe /
T03D3807-1:31b-37: 'di rnams dang ldan pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad ces bya'o //
T03D3807-1:31b-38: byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa 'di yang 'og
T03D3807-1:31b-39: nas theg pa chen po bstan pa las rgyas par
T03D3807-1:32a-1: yang dag par spong ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid
T03D3807-1:32a-2: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas yang
T03D3807-1:32a-3: dag pa'i spong ba la sogs pa dmigs su med
T03D3807-1:32a-4: pa'i ngo bo nyid du yongs su shes par byed
T03D3807-1:32a-5: cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
T03D3807-1:32a-6: gnas te / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do zhes bshad do //
T03D3807-1:32a-7: stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la yongs su
T03D3807-1:32a-8: rdzogs par bya'o zhes bya ba ni rnam par thar
T03D3807-1:32a-9: pa'i sgo gsum byang chub kyi phyogs bsgom pa dang
T03D3807-1:32a-11: mya ngan las 'das pa thob par byed pa'i phyir /
T03D3807-1:32a-12: byang chub kyi phyogs nyid kyi nang du bgrang ngo //
T03D3807-1:32a-13: 'dir ni byang chub sems dpa'i skabs su gtogs pas ting nge 'dzin gsum du brjod do //
T03D3807-1:32a-14: de la stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid ni /
T03D3807-1:32a-15: kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid kyis stong ste /
T03D3807-1:32a-16: kun brtags pa'i rnam pa des stong ngo zhes stong pa'i rnam par bsgoms na /
T03D3807-1:32a-17: sems rtse gcig tu gyur pa la stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o //
T03D3807-1:32a-18: brjod du med pa'i don dam pa de nyid nam
T03D3807-1:32a-19: mkha' bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid thams
T03D3807-1:32a-21: mtshan ma'i rnam pa med pa'i mtshan nyid spros pa
T03D3807-1:32a-22: thams cad nye bar zhi ba yin pas zhi ba'i
T03D3807-1:32a-24: sems rtse gcig tu gyur pa la mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o //
T03D3807-1:32a-25: de bzhin du khams gsum pa rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rnam par mthong bas /
T03D3807-1:32a-26: chos thams cad la mi mthun pa'i 'du shes nye bar bzhag nas /
T03D3807-1:32a-27: phyis de la smon pa'i gnas su mi byed par
T03D3807-1:32a-28: yang dag par rjes su mthong pa na sems rtse
T03D3807-1:32a-29: gcig tu gyur pa la smon pa med pa'i ting
T03D3807-1:32a-31: de ltar nyon mongs pa med pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi spyod pa bstan nas /
T03D3807-1:32a-32: de ni bar du gcod pa med par sems can
T03D3807-1:32a-33: yongs su smin par byed pa'i spyod pa bstan pa'i
T03D3807-1:32a-34: phyir / bsam gtan mi dmigs pa'i phyir bsam gtan
T03D3807-1:32a-35: bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes bya ba la
T03D3807-1:32a-37: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba de yang 'jig rten pa dang /
T03D3807-1:32b-0: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam @32b gtan dang ting nge 'dzin gyi phyogs dang /
T03D3807-1:32b-1: mngon par shes pa'i phyogs dang /
T03D3807-1:32b-2: ye shes kyi phyogs kyis bya dgos pas /
T03D3807-1:32b-3: phyogs kyi chos gsum char yang der 'dus te /
T03D3807-1:32b-4: de la bsam gtan la sogs pa'i chos thams cad
T03D3807-1:32b-5: dang por sems can la phan par bya ba'i phyir
T03D3807-1:32b-7: phyis don dam par yongs su brtags na bsam gtan
T03D3807-1:32b-8: la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par zhen
T03D3807-1:32b-9: par mi byed par snying rje dang /
T03D3807-1:32b-10: thabs mkhas pa gnyis kyis slar yang kun rdzob nyid
T03D3807-1:32b-11: la dmigs nas sems can la phan par byed pas
T03D3807-1:32b-12: sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i spyod pa
T03D3807-1:32b-14: de la bsam gtan bzhi ni gzugs kyi khams kyi bsam gtan dang po dang /
T03D3807-1:32b-19: bsam gtan dang po'i ni rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'o ;
T03D3807-1:32b-20: / bsam gtan gnyis pa ni rtog pa med pa la dpyod pa tsam dang bcas pa'o //
T03D3807-1:32b-22: bzhi pa gnyis ni rtog pa yang med dpyod pa yang med pa ste /
T03D3807-1:32b-23: bsam gtan de dag 'jig rten pa rnams ni bdag tu lta ba dang bcas par bsgom /
T03D3807-1:32b-24: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams ni gang zag la bdag med par rtogs nas bsgom mo //
T03D3807-1:32b-25: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chos dang gang zag gnyis la bdag med par rtogs nas bsgoms te /
T03D3807-1:32b-26: don dam par bsam gtan dmigs su med kyang /
T03D3807-1:32b-27: kun rdzob tu snying rje dang thabs mkhas pa gnyis
T03D3807-1:32b-28: kyi dbang gis so so'i mtshan nyid ji lta ba
T03D3807-1:32b-30: tshad med pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes bya ba ni byams pa dang /
T03D3807-1:32b-34: de bzhi char la yang byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa gsum gyis bsgom ste /
T03D3807-1:32b-36: sems can la dmigs pa dang /
T03D3807-1:32b-39: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su
T03D3807-1:32b-40: rdzogs par bya'o zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' mtha'
T03D3807-1:33a-2: cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /
T03D3807-1:33a-3: 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched do //
T03D3807-1:33a-4: rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o
T03D3807-1:33a-5: zhes bya ba ni gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta
T03D3807-1:33a-6: ba dang / nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba dang /
T03D3807-1:33a-7: sdug pa'i rnam pa la mos pa dang /
T03D3807-1:33a-8: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pa bzhi dang /
T03D3807-1:33a-10: tshor ba 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa dang brgyad do //
T03D3807-1:33a-11: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs
T03D3807-1:33a-12: su rdzogs par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan
T03D3807-1:33a-13: bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /
T03D3807-1:33a-15: tshor ba 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang dgu'o //
T03D3807-1:33a-16: mngon par shes pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T03D3807-1:33a-19: / gzhan gyi sems shes pa dang /
T03D3807-1:33a-20: rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba shes pa dang /
T03D3807-1:33a-21: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'o //
T03D3807-1:33a-22: 'du shes bcu bsgom par bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T03D3807-1:33a-23: 'dod chags kyi gnyen por rnam par bam pa la sogs pa'i 'du shes bcu bsgom pa bstan to//
T03D3807-1:33a-24: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba nas /
T03D3807-1:33a-25: lha rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o zhes bya
T03D3807-1:33a-26: ba'i bar du rjes su dran pa drug bsgom pa
T03D3807-1:33a-27: bstan pa ste / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
T03D3807-1:33a-28: rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa kha lo sgyur
T03D3807-1:33a-29: ba skyes bu 'dul ba bla na med pa 'jig
T03D3807-1:33a-30: rten mkhyen pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i yon
T03D3807-1:33a-31: tan gyi sgo nas rjes su dran pa'o //
T03D3807-1:33a-32: chos rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba ni lung gi chos dang /
T03D3807-1:33a-33: thob par bya ba'i chos so //
T03D3807-1:33a-34: de la lung gi chos ni mdo'i sde la sogs
T03D3807-1:33a-35: pa theg pa che chung gi gsung rab rnams kyi
T03D3807-1:33a-36: yon tan rjes su dran pa'o//
T03D3807-1:33a-37: thob par bya ba'i chos ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i chos dang /
T03D3807-1:33a-40: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la
T03D3807-1:33a-41: sogs pa'i yon tan rnams rjes su dran pa bsgom
T03D3807-1:33a-42: pa'o // dge 'dun rjes su dran pa bsgom par
T03D3807-1:33b-0: bya'o zhes bya ba ni @33b 'phags pa'i gang zag
T03D3807-1:33b-1: pa'o // brgyad la / bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan
T03D3807-1:33b-2: thos kyi dge 'dun ni 'phags pa'i lam la gnas
T03D3807-1:33b-3: pa'o // brgyad la / pa / shin tu legs
T03D3807-1:33b-4: par zhugs pa sbyin gnas chen po bsod nams kyi
T03D3807-1:33b-5: zhing yin pa la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi sgo
T03D3807-1:33b-6: nas rjes su dran par bya ba bsgom pa'o //
T03D3807-1:33b-7: tshul khrims rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba ni lus kyi sdom pa gsum dang /
T03D3807-1:33b-8: ngag gi sdom pa bzhi bsdams shing srog gcod pa
T03D3807-1:33b-9: la sogs pa'i rnam pa bdun spangs pa'i mtshan nyid
T03D3807-1:33b-10: la mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ba'i yon tan
T03D3807-1:33b-11: gyi sgo nas rjes su dran pa'o //
T03D3807-1:33b-12: gtong ba rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba ni chos dang /
T03D3807-1:33b-14: mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i 'bras bu 'jig rten dang
T03D3807-1:33b-15: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i longs spyod chen po'i rgyu
T03D3807-1:33b-16: yin pa'i sgo nas rjes su dran pa'o //
T03D3807-1:33b-17: lha rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o zhes bya
T03D3807-1:33b-18: ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
T03D3807-1:33b-19: lha rnams las bzang po dang /
T03D3807-1:33b-20: bsod nams chen po'i rgyu las byung ba yin pas brnyas shing smad par bya bar mi rigs kyi /
T03D3807-1:33b-21: mchod pa dang bkur sti bya ba'i gnas yin pa'i sgo nas rjes su dran par bya'o //
T03D3807-1:33b-22: dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan dang /
T03D3807-1:33b-23: ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa la sems sbyang zhing las
T03D3807-1:33b-24: su rung bar bya ba'i phyir dbugs phyi nang du
T03D3807-1:33b-25: rgyu ba rjes su dran par bya ba bsgom pa'o
T03D3807-1:33b-26: // skyo ba rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba ni skye ba dang /
T03D3807-1:33b-34: 'khrugs pa la sogs pa yid 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i
T03D3807-1:33b-35: gnas rnams la dmigs nas nyes dmigs su lta zhing
T03D3807-1:33b-36: skyo ba rjes su dran pa'o //
T03D3807-1:33b-37: byang chub sems dpa'i skyo ba rjes su dran pa
T03D3807-1:33b-38: ni chos thams cad bdag med pa'i ngo bo nyid
T03D3807-1:33b-39: yin pa la / byis pa rnams kyis snying po
T03D3807-1:33b-40: can du blo bskyed de 'jug par mthong nas de
T03D3807-1:33b-41: dag shes par bya bar myur du sngon du gtong
T03D3807-1:33b-42: ba'i yid la byed pa ni skyo ba rjes su
T03D3807-1:33b-44: 'chi ba rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o zhes
T03D3807-1:33b-45: bya ba yang skyo ba rjes su dran par bya
T03D3807-1:34a-1: nang du gtogs mod kyi logs shig tu bkar te /
T03D3807-1:34a-2: smos pa ni lhag par skyo bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3807-1:34a-3: lus rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o zhes bya
T03D3807-1:34a-4: ba ni lus la ma chags par bya ba'i phyir
T03D3807-1:34a-5: / glad pa'i rgyas nas rkang pa'i bar du mi gtsang ba sna tshogs kyis gang bar bsgom pa'o //
T03D3807-1:34a-6: mi rtag pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o zhes bya
T03D3807-1:34a-7: ba la sogs pa rnam pa gsum ni sdug bsngal
T03D3807-1:34a-8: gyi phung po lnga la mi rtag pa dang /
T03D3807-1:34a-10: bdag med pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o //
T03D3807-1:34a-11: mi sdug pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o zhes bya
T03D3807-1:34a-12: ba ni rnam par bam pa la sogs pa'i 'du
T03D3807-1:34a-13: shes bcu gong du smos pa nyid mdor bsdus te
T03D3807-1:34a-15: 'chi ba'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba
T03D3807-1:34a-16: gang du yang 'chi ba'i 'du shes smos pas lan
T03D3807-1:34a-18: gong du smos pa ni rjes su dran pa'i skabs yin ;
T03D3807-1:34a-19: 'di ni 'du shes kyi skabs yin pas nyes pa med do //
T03D3807-1:34a-20: dga' bar bya ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir 'jig rten
T03D3807-1:34a-21: thams cad la dga' bar mi bya ba'i 'du shes
T03D3807-1:34a-22: bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pa'i
T03D3807-1:34a-23: rigs pa dang / bzo'i gnas thams cad dang /
T03D3807-1:34a-24: sgyu rtsal rnam pa sna tshogs drug cu rtsa bzhi
T03D3807-1:34a-25: la sogs pa la mngon par dga' bar mi bya'o
T03D3807-1:34a-26: // yid brtan du mi rung ba'i 'du shes bsgom
T03D3807-1:34a-27: par bya'o zhes bya ba ni khams gsum pa la
T03D3807-1:34a-28: chags su rung ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su
T03D3807-1:34a-29: ma mthong bas de la 'dod pa med par gyur
T03D3807-1:34a-30: // ba'o // sdug bsngal shes pa bsgom par bya'o
T03D3807-1:34a-31: zhes bya ba ni phung po la sogs pa'i chos
T03D3807-1:34a-32: thams cad kun rdzob kyi sgo nas /
T03D3807-1:34a-33: sdug bsngal ba nyid du shes par byas nas /

T03D3807-1:50b-18: don du sbyar ba rnams la thogs pa med de
T03D3807-1:50b-19: / ji ltar sbyar ba de bzhin du 'grub pas don med par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir /
T03D3807-1:50b-20: sems can rnams bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po lnga la 'god pa don med par mi 'gyur te /

T03D3807-1:50b-29: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni shes rab kyi mig go //
T03D3807-1:50b-30: thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa dang /

T03D3807-1:50b-32: mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa dang /
T03D3807-1:50b-33: khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni chos kyi mig go //

T03D3807-1:50b-40: pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sa
T03D3807-1:51a-0: @51a * // bcu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
T03D3807-1:51a-1: kyi mngon par shes pa lnga khyad par du 'phags
T03D3807-1:51a-2: pa thob par bstan pa ste /
T03D3807-1:51a-3: 'jig rten pa'i mngon par shes pa dang /
T03D3807-1:51a-4: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi mngon par shes pa rnams ni bdag dang mtshungs pa dang /
T03D3807-1:51a-5: bdag pas dma' ba rnams kyi sems la sogs pa shes pa tsam du zad kyi /
T03D3807-1:51a-6: byang chub sems dpa' yongs su dag pa rnams kyi
T03D3807-1:51a-7: mngon par shes pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
T03D3807-1:51a-8: la sogs pas gong ma rnams kyi thugs la sogs
T03D3807-1:51a-9: pa shes pa la thogs pa med de /
T03D3807-1:51a-10: de lta bu'i mngon par shes pa khyad par can
T03D3807-1:51a-11: dang ldan pa'i yon tan thob par 'dod pas shes
T03D3807-1:51a-12: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par
T03D3807-1:51a-13: bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03D3807-1:51a-14: shar phyogs la ji lta ba bzhin du phyogs lhag
T03D3807-1:51a-15: ma bcu la yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o
T03D3807-1:51a-16: // sha ra dva ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
T03D3807-1:51a-17: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan
T03D3807-1:51a-18: 'das de dag phyogs bcu kun du chos gang ston
T03D3807-1:51a-19: pa de dag thams cad dran pa'i stobs dang /
T03D3807-1:51a-20: shugs gcad du mi chod pas yang dag par gzung bar 'dod pa dang /
T03D3807-1:51a-21: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
T03D3807-1:51a-22: chub kyi bar du de thams cad chud mi za

T03D3807-1:51a-24: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i gzungs khyad
T03D3807-1:51a-26: yon tan de lta bu thob par 'dod pas shes
T03D3807-1:51a-27: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslab
T03D3807-1:51a-28: par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03D3807-1:51a-29: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang /

T03D3807-1:51a-32: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa mang po mthong bar 'dod pa dang /
T03D3807-1:51a-33: yongs su sgrub par 'dod pas zhes bya ba ni
T03D3807-1:51a-34: sa bcu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus gsum
T03D3807-1:51a-35: gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag pa dang /
T03D3807-1:51a-36: ma dag pa mthong bar bya ba dang yongs su dag pa sgrub nus te /
T03D3807-1:51a-37: de lta bu'i yon tan thob par 'dod pas shes
T03D3807-1:51a-38: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par
T03D3807-1:51a-39: bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03D3807-1:51a-40: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mdo dang /
T03D3807-1:51b-0: lung du bstan pa zhes bya ba @51b la sogs
T03D3807-1:51b-1: pa ni sa bcu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
T03D3807-1:51b-2: kyi shes rab kyi mthu bstan pa ste /
T03D3807-1:51b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis
T03D3807-1:51b-4: po de dag skad cig yud tsam thang cig gis
T03D3807-1:51b-5: thos pa dang / gzung ba nas gzhan la rgya
T03D3807-1:51b-6: cher yang dag par ston par nus pa'i yon tan
T03D3807-1:51b-7: de lta bu thob par 'dod pas shes rab kyi
T03D3807-1:51b-8: pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslab par bya'o
T03D3807-1:51b-9: zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
T03D3807-1:51b-10: shar phyogs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis gsungs pa dang /
T03D3807-1:51b-11: gsung bar 'gyur ba gang ci yang rung ste zhes
T03D3807-1:51b-12: bya ba la sogs pa yang byang chub sems dpa'
T03D3807-1:51b-13: de dag gi shes rab yongs su dag pa /
T03D3807-1:51b-14: bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa dang
T03D3807-1:51b-15: ldan pa de lta bu thob par 'dod pas zhes
T03D3807-1:51b-17: de bzhin du phyogs bcu la sbyar bar bya'o //
T03D3807-1:51b-18: shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na /
T03D3807-1:51b-19: mun pa mun gnag smag tu gyur pa /
T03D3807-1:51b-21: nyi ma dang zla ba 'de ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar gzi brjid che la /
T03D3807-1:51b-22: 'di ltar mthu che ba gnyis kyis kyang lham mer mi rung /
T03D3807-1:51b-24: lhang nger mi rung ba de lta bu thams cad
T03D3807-1:51b-25: snang bar bya bar 'dod pas zhes bya ba la
T03D3807-1:51b-26: sogs pas ni sa bcu pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
T03D3807-1:51b-27: rnams kyi mthu phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa ste
T03D3807-1:51b-28: / de lta bu'i mthu dang yon tan thob par
T03D3807-1:51b-29: 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3807-1:51b-30: la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste
T03D3807-1:51b-31: / / mun pa mun gnag smag tu gyur pa
T03D3807-1:51b-32: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi khams dag gi
T03D3807-1:51b-33: bar gyi mun gnag la bya'o //
T03D3807-1:51b-34: shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+g'a'i klung gi
T03D3807-1:51b-35: bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang
T03D3807-1:51b-37: dge 'dun gyi sgra sems can rnams kyis ma thos
T03D3807-1:51b-38: pa de lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu
T03D3807-1:51b-39: sems can de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas dang
T03D3807-1:51b-40: chos dang dge 'dun gyi sgra thos par bya bar
T03D3807-1:51b-41: 'dod pa dang / yang dag pa'i lta ba la
T03D3807-1:51b-42: dgod par 'dod pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs
T03D3807-1:51b-43: pas sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi
T03D3807-1:51b-44: mthus sems can yongs su smin par byed nus pa
T03D3807-1:52a-0: 'dod pa dang / bstan te / de lta bu'i yon tan thob par 'dod pas shes @52a * //
T03D3807-1:52a-1: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslab par bya'o zhes bstan to //
T03D3807-1:52a-2: shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na /
T03D3807-1:52a-3: sems can long ba ji snyed cig yod pa de
T03D3807-1:52a-4: dag thams cad bdag gi mthus mig gis gzugs mthong
T03D3807-1:52a-5: ba dang / 'on pa rnams rna bas sgra thos pa dang /
T03D3807-1:52a-6: smyon pa rnams dran pa thob pa dang /
T03D3807-1:52a-7: gos med pa rnams gos thob pa dang /
T03D3807-1:52a-8: bkres pa dang skom pa rnams zas dang skom thob pa dang /
T03D3807-1:52a-9: nad pa rnams nad 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang /
T03D3807-1:52a-10: btson ra dang khri mon na 'khod pa rnams bdag gi rdzu 'phrul dang /
T03D3807-1:52a-11: bdag gi mthus dga' mgur 'dod du yod par bya'o
T03D3807-1:52a-12: snyam na yang zhes bya ba la sogs pas sa
T03D3807-1:52a-13: bcu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sems can
T03D3807-1:52a-14: sdug bsngal sna tshogs las thar bar bya ba'i mthu
T03D3807-1:52a-15: phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa ste /
T03D3807-1:52a-16: mthu dang yon tan de lta bu thob par 'dod
T03D3807-1:52a-17: pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
T03D3807-1:52a-18: bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03D3807-1:52a-19: ji ltar na phyogs bcu kun gyi phyogs re re'i
T03D3807-1:52a-20: 'jig rten gyi khams gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed
T03D3807-1:52a-21: dag na / sems can mi khom pa dang /
T03D3807-1:52a-22: ngan song du lhung ba sems can dmyal ba'am /
T03D3807-1:52a-23: byol song gi skye gnas sam /
T03D3807-1:52a-24: gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad bdag gi mthus /
T03D3807-1:52a-25: de nas tshe 'phos nas mi'i lus thob par bya snyam ste zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T03D3807-1:52a-26: sa bcu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi
T03D3807-1:52a-27: mthus sems can rnams kyi mi khom pa brgyad la
T03D3807-1:52a-28: sogs pa med par bya nus pa dang /
T03D3807-1:52a-29: de dag med par byas nas kyang /
T03D3807-1:52a-30: tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa'i 'bras
T03D3807-1:52a-31: bu phun sum tshogs pa la 'god par nus pa
T03D3807-1:52a-32: bstan pa ste / mthu dang yon tan de lta
T03D3807-1:52a-33: bu thob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpas shes
T03D3807-1:52a-34: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par

T03D3807-1:52a-37: che ba'i bdag nyid thob par 'dod pas shes rab
T03D3807-1:52a-38: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya
T03D3807-1:52a-39: ba bstan nas / de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi
T03D3807-1:52a-40: che ba'i bdag nyid thob par 'dod pas shes rab
T03D3807-1:52a-41: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya
T03D3807-1:52b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam la bslab par 'dod
T03D3807-1:52b-2: pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te
T03D3807-1:52b-3: / de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam ni bzhengs pa dang /
T03D3807-1:52b-6: mnal ba rnams nyan thos dang /
T03D3807-1:52b-8: byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa gzhan gang dang
T03D3807-1:52b-9: yang mi 'dra bar 'phags par bzang zhing 'di kho
T03D3807-1:52b-10: na lta bu yin no zhes sus kyang mi rtogs
T03D3807-1:52b-11: pa'o // de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa dang /
T03D3807-1:52b-12: tshul rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba yang spyod lam gyi khyad par nyid bstan te /
T03D3807-1:52b-13: spyod pa dang tshul la skyon med cing ;
T03D3807-1:52b-14: bdag dang gzhan gyi don du phun sum tshogs par mdzad pa la rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o //
T03D3807-1:52b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i phrin las dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T03D3807-1:52b-16: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bshad pa'i skabs su bshad pa'o //
T03D3807-1:52b-17: ji ltar na bdag gis glang po chen po'i lta stangs kyis bltas te /
T03D3807-1:52b-18: sems can rnams la thogs pa med par chos bstan par 'gyur zhes bya ba la /
T03D3807-1:52b-19: glang po che zhes bya ba ni rgya gar skad du n'a ga zhes bya ste /
T03D3807-1:52b-20: n'a ga zhes bya ba dam pa'am /
T03D3807-1:52b-25: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la yang bya ste /
T03D3807-1:52b-26: skabs 'dir ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzigs
T03D3807-1:52b-27: pa'i stangs sam thabs la glang po che'i lta stangs
T03D3807-1:52b-28: zhes bya ste / lta stangs de yang steng na 'dug pa la bskyed de mi lta /
T03D3807-1:52b-29: 'og na 'dug pa la btud de mi lta /
T03D3807-1:52b-30: g-yas g-yon na 'dug pa la mig bzur te mi lta /
T03D3807-1:52b-31: rgyab na 'dug pa la mjing pa bsgyur te mi lta /
T03D3807-1:52b-32: thag ring po na 'dug pa la bsgrims te mi lta /
T03D3807-1:52b-33: thag nye ba na 'dug pa la sgrim pa med par yang mi lta'i /
T03D3807-1:52b-34: ji ltar 'dug pa'i spyod lam dang ji ltar lta
T03D3807-1:52b-35: ba'i mig gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du
T03D3807-1:52b-37: chos thams cad la lta ba ni glang po che'i
T03D3807-1:52b-38: lta stangs zhes bya ste lta stangs de lta bus
T03D3807-1:52b-39: bltas nas / sems can rnams la thogs pa med
T03D3807-1:52b-40: par lhun gyis grub pa nyid du chos ston pa'i

T03D3807-1:53a-22: na bdag rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha
T03D3807-1:53a-23: rnams dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni de

T03D3807-1:53a-34: bting ba phun sum tshogs pa dang gdan phun sum

T03D3807-1:195b-27: dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3807-1:195b-29: nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /
T03D3807-1:195b-30: brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa /
T03D3807-1:195b-31: dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang /
T03D3807-1:195b-32: yid mi bde ba bsal zhing rnam par spyod do
T03D3807-1:195b-33: zhes bya ba'i bar du ni nang gi lus la
T03D3807-1:195b-34: mi gtsang ba sna tshogs yod par brtag pa'i sgo
T03D3807-1:195b-35: nas lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bstan pa
T03D3807-1:195b-36: ste / de ltar lus la mi gtsang ba sna
T03D3807-1:195b-37: tshogs kyis gang bar brtags na lus la ma chags
T03D3807-1:195b-39: chun pa'i snod 'bru sna tshogs kyis gang ba'i dpe
T03D3807-1:195b-40: bstan pa ni zhing pa 'bru'i rgyus la mkhas pa
T03D3807-1:196a-1: tshogs la mngon du lta zhing /
T03D3807-1:196a-2: 'bru'i bye brag phyed pa de bzhin du /
T03D3807-1:196a-3: bsam gtan pa lus mi gtsang bar bsgom pa yang
T03D3807-1:196a-4: lus mi gtsang ba sna tshogs kyis gang ba mngon
T03D3807-1:196a-5: sum du gyur par byed pa bstan pa'o //
T03D3807-1:196a-6: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
T03D3807-1:196a-7: chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3807-1:196a-9: nam dur khrod na yod pa'i gzugs sna tshogs dur
T03D3807-1:196a-10: khrod du bor ba ro'i mal du bsnyal ba zhes
T03D3807-1:196a-11: bya ba la sogs pa ni phyi'i lus la dmigs
T03D3807-1:196a-12: pa'i sgo nas lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
T03D3807-1:196a-14: phyi'i lus dur khrod na 'dug pa gsar rnying mi
T03D3807-1:196a-15: sdug pa gsar rnying sna tshogs dang ldan pa mthong
T03D3807-1:196a-16: nas bdag gi lus kyang de lta bu'i rang bzhin
T03D3807-1:196a-17: can yin par brtags nas lus lam chags par bya
T03D3807-1:196a-19: rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
T03D3807-1:196a-20: dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3807-1:196a-22: nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
T03D3807-1:196a-23: lus kyi rjes su lta zhing zhes bya ba la
T03D3807-1:196a-24: sogs pa ni theg pa chung ngu'i gzhung las 'byung
T03D3807-1:196a-25: ba'i tshul gyis lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
T03D3807-1:196a-26: bsgom pa mjug bsdus nas bstan pa ste /
T03D3807-1:196a-27: nang dang phyi dang phyi nang gi lus ni sngar bshad pa bzhin no //
T03D3807-1:196a-28: nang gi tshor ba la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
T03D3807-1:196a-29: gyis tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing zhes bya ba
T03D3807-1:196a-30: la sogs pa ni theg pa chung ngu'i gzhung las
T03D3807-1:196a-31: 'byung ba'i tshul gyis tshor ba dang sems dang chos
T03D3807-1:196a-32: rnams la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgoms pa
T03D3807-1:196a-33: bstan pa ste / de dag gi don kyang snga ma bzhin no //
T03D3807-1:196a-34: rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
T03D3807-1:196a-35: chen po'i theg pa chen po'o zhes bya ba'i theg
T03D3807-1:196a-36: pa chung ngu'i gzhung las 'byung ba'i tshul gyis dran
T03D3807-1:196a-37: pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgom pa 'di yang
T03D3807-1:196a-38: byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3807-1:196a-39: phyin pa la spyod pas gang zag dang chos gnyi
T03D3807-1:196a-40: ga la bdag med par rtogs par byas nas de
T03D3807-1:196a-41: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgoms na bla na med
T03D3807-1:196a-42: pa'i byang chub theg pa chen po 'thob pa'i rgyur
T03D3807-1:196a-43: 'gyur ba'i phyir theg pa chen po zhes bya'o zhes
T03D3807-1:196b-0: bstan @196b pa'o // pa ste / brtson 'grus kyis
T03D3807-1:196b-1: sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams
T03D3807-1:196b-3: skyes pa rnams spangs pa dang /
T03D3807-1:196b-4: dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams pa skyed pa dang /
T03D3807-1:196b-5: skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang /
T03D3807-1:196b-7: yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'bad pa la yang dag par spong pa zhes bya'o //
T03D3807-1:196b-8: de la brtson 'grus la yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
T03D3807-1:196b-10: sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang mi skyo ba'i brtson 'grus dang /
T03D3807-1:196b-12: de la mos pa bskyed cing zhes bya ba ni
T03D3807-1:196b-13: dang po 'di ltar bya'o zhes sems mos shing 'dun
T03D3807-1:196b-16: rtsol lo zhes bya ba ni de ltar go cha
T03D3807-1:196b-17: bgos pa'i brtson 'grus dang mthun par sdig pa'i chos
T03D3807-1:196b-18: spang ba dang / dge ba'i chos skyed pa la sbyor bas sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus zhes bya'o //
T03D3807-1:196b-19: brtson 'grus rtsom mo zhes bya ba ni mi skyo ba'i brtson 'grus te /
T03D3807-1:196b-20: bya dka' zhing tshegs che ba byung du zin kyang
T03D3807-1:196b-21: sems mi skyo ba'i brtson 'grus rtsom pas na mi
T03D3807-1:196b-24: yang dag par smon lam 'debs te zhes bya ba ni thabs kyi brtson 'grus te /
T03D3807-1:196b-25: bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin sgom pa'i che sems
T03D3807-1:196b-26: bying bar gyur na thabs kyis sems kyi mthu skyed
T03D3807-1:196b-27: cing gsal bar byed pa dang /
T03D3807-1:196b-28: sems rgod par gyur na thabs kyis sems rtse gcig
T03D3807-1:196b-29: tu 'jog pa la thabs kyi brtson 'grus zhes bya'o
T03D3807-1:196b-30: // yang dag par smon lam 'debs zhes bya ba
T03D3807-1:196b-31: ni skabs 'dir sems legs par 'jog cing mi g-yengs
T03D3807-1:196b-33: theg pa chen po'i don ni sngar bshad pa bzhin no //
T03D3807-1:196b-34: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
T03D3807-1:196b-35: chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar rdzu
T03D3807-1:196b-36: 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ste zhes bya ba la
T03D3807-1:197a-1: pa zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
T03D3807-1:197a-2: rdzu 'phrul rnams thob par byed pa'i rgyu'am /
T03D3807-1:197a-3: gzhi'am rten yin pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin rnam pa
T03D3807-1:197a-4: bzhi la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa zhes bya ste
T03D3807-1:197a-5: / ting nge 'dzin rnam pa bzhi ni mos pa dang sems dang /
T03D3807-1:197a-8: de la mos pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni dge ba'i
T03D3807-1:197a-9: chos sgom pa la mos pa cher skyes nas mos
T03D3807-1:197a-10: pa'i dbang gis sems mnyam par gzhag cing rtse gcig
T03D3807-1:197a-11: tu gyur pa la mos pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes
T03D3807-1:197a-12: bya'o // spong ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa zhes
T03D3807-1:197a-13: bya ba ni de ltar ting nge 'dzin bsgoms pa'i
T03D3807-1:197a-14: mthus spong ba'i 'du byed brgyad dang ldan par 'gyur
T03D3807-1:197a-15: bya'o // te / brgyad gang zhe na /
T03D3807-1:197a-24: chos 'di brgyad kyis nyon mongs pa spong bar byed pa'i phyir spong ba'i 'du byed ces bya'o //
T03D3807-1:197a-25: de la 'dun pa ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam gtan dang /
T03D3807-1:197a-26: ting nge 'dzin rnams la snyoms par 'jug 'dod pa'o //
T03D3807-1:197a-27: brtson 'grus ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad nges par sel bar rtsol zhing 'bad pa'o //
T03D3807-1:197a-28: dad pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la sogs pa 'bras bu bzhi dang ;
T03D3807-1:197a-29: sa bcu la sogs pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rnams thob par 'dod pa'o //
T03D3807-1:197a-30: shin tu sbyangs pa'i bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'i tshe /
T03D3807-1:197a-31: lus dang sems las su rung ba'o //
T03D3807-1:197a-32: dran pa ni bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin la sems ma rmongs pa'o //
T03D3807-1:197a-33: shes bzhin ni shes rab kyi dbang gis mi mthun
T03D3807-1:197a-34: pa'i phyogs kyi chos rnams mi 'byung bar bag byed
T03D3807-1:197a-35: pa'o // sems pa ni sems yongs su sbyong ba'i mtshan nyid sems mngon par 'du byed pa'o //
T03D3807-1:197b-0: btang snyoms ni sems bying pa @197b dang ;
T03D3807-1:197b-1: rgod pa med cing mnyam pa nyid du lhun gyis grub pa ste /
T03D3807-1:197b-2: chos de brgyad dang ldan na nyon mongs pa la
T03D3807-1:197b-3: sogs pa ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi chos rnams
T03D3807-1:197b-4: spong bar byed pa'i phyir spong ba'i 'du byed dang
T03D3807-1:197b-6: dben pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba ni mos
T03D3807-1:197b-7: pa'i ting nge 'dzin de phyi dang nang gi 'du
T03D3807-1:197b-8: 'dzi dang bral bar gnas pa la bya'o //
T03D3807-1:197b-9: 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa zhes bya
T03D3807-1:197b-10: ba ni khams gsum gyi nyon mongs pa rnams dang
T03D3807-1:197b-12: 'gog pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal rnams 'gog par gyur ba'o //
T03D3807-1:197b-13: rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa zhes bya
T03D3807-1:197b-14: ba ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga rnams
T03D3807-1:197b-15: yongs su spangs par gyur pa'o //
T03D3807-1:197b-16: brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba ni
T03D3807-1:197b-17: mi dge ba'i chos spong ba la brtson pa dang
T03D3807-1:197b-18: / dge ba'i chos spel ba la brtson pa'i brtson
T03D3807-1:197b-19: 'grus lhur blangs pa'i dbang gis sems mnyam par gzhag
T03D3807-1:197b-20: cing rtse gcig tu gyur pa'o //
T03D3807-1:197b-21: sems kyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba ni zhi
T03D3807-1:197b-22: gnas dang lhag mthong zung du 'brel par sems sbyong
T03D3807-1:197b-23: ba lhur blangs nas mnyam par 'jog cing sems rtse
T03D3807-1:197b-25: dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba ni shes
T03D3807-1:197b-26: rab kyi gnyen po dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi
T03D3807-1:197b-27: chos rnams rnam par dpyad pa lhur blangs nas mnyam
T03D3807-1:197b-28: par gzhag cing sems rtse gcig tu gyur pa la
T03D3807-1:197b-29: bya ste / spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa dang /
T03D3807-1:197b-30: dben pa la gnas pa la sogs pa ni gong du bshad pa bzhin no //
T03D3807-1:197b-31: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
T03D3807-1:197b-32: chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar dbang
T03D3807-1:197b-33: po lnga ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni
T03D3807-1:197b-34: / dbang po lnga theg pa chen po yin par bstan pa ste /
T03D3807-1:197b-39: shes rab dang chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa'i dbang
T03D3807-1:197b-40: gis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rgyun du zhugs
T03D3807-1:197b-41: pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu bzhi dang /
T03D3807-1:197b-42: sa dang po la sogs pa 'thob pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba'i phyir dbang po zhes bya'o //

T03D3807-1:198a-2: ni 'di ltar stobs lnga ste zhes bya ba la
T03D3807-1:198a-3: sogs pa ni stobs lnga theg pa chen po yin
T03D3807-1:198a-5: dad pa la sogs pa'i dbang po lnga po de
T03D3807-1:198a-6: dag nyid yang dang yang du bsgoms pa'i mthus brtan
T03D3807-1:198a-7: zhing mthu dang ldan par gyur pa na nyon mongs
T03D3807-1:198a-8: pa la sogs pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi chos
T03D3807-1:198a-9: rnams kyis mi tshugs shing zil gyis mi non pa'i
T03D3807-1:198a-11: dbang po lnga dang stobs lnga po de dag bsgoms
T03D3807-1:198a-12: na nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge
T03D3807-1:198a-13: ba'i rtsa ba bzhi dang ldan par 'gyur te /
T03D3807-1:198a-14: bzhi gang zhe na dro bar gyur pa dang /
T03D3807-1:198a-17: 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog go //
T03D3807-1:198a-18: de la dro bar gyur pa dang /
T03D3807-1:198a-19: rtse mor gyur pa'i tshe na dad pa la sogs pa la dbang po lnga zhes bya'o //
T03D3807-1:198a-20: bzod pa dang 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i tshe ni stobs lnga zhes bya'o //
T03D3807-1:198a-21: de la nges par 'byed pa zhes bya ba ni
T03D3807-1:198a-22: byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la chos kyi
T03D3807-1:198a-23: dbyings de kho na nyid nges par rtogs shing bye
T03D3807-1:198a-24: brag phyed pas na nges par 'byed pa zhes bya'o
T03D3807-1:198a-25: // dbang po lnga dang stobs lnga bsgoms te /
T03D3807-1:198a-29: 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog rnams dang ldan par
T03D3807-1:198a-30: gyur na nges par 'byed pa zhes bya ba sa
T03D3807-1:198a-31: dang po'i cha dang mthun zhing /
T03D3807-1:198a-32: sa dang po 'thob pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba'i phyir /
T03D3807-1:198a-33: nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bzhes bya'o //
T03D3807-1:198a-34: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
T03D3807-1:198a-35: chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar byang
T03D3807-1:198a-36: chub kyi yan lag bdun te zhes bya ba la
T03D3807-1:198a-37: sogs pa ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun theg
T03D3807-1:198a-38: pa chen po yin par bstan pa ste /
T03D3807-1:198a-39: de la byang chub ces bya ba ni sa dang
T03D3807-1:198a-40: po la byang chub kyi rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings
T03D3807-1:198a-41: de bzhin nyid rtogs pa la bya'o //
T03D3807-1:198a-42: dran pa la sogs pa chos bdun po 'di dag
T03D3807-1:198a-43: byang chub kyi rang bzhin de rtogs par bya ba'i
T03D3807-1:198a-45: rgyu'am yan lag tu gyur pa'i phyir byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya ste /
T03D3807-1:198b-5: btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so //
T03D3807-1:198b-6: de la dran pa ni dmigs pa'i dngos po ma brjed cing sems gsal ba'o //
T03D3807-1:198b-7: brtson 'grus ni chos kyi dbyings nyid rtogs par bya ba la sems spro zhing sgrim pa dang /
T03D3807-1:198b-9: dga' ba ni chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa sngon ma mthong zhing nyams su ma myong ba /
T03D3807-1:198b-10: sa dang po thob pa'i tshe mthong zhing chos kyi dga' ba nyams su myong ba la bya'o //
T03D3807-1:198b-11: shin tu sbyangs pa ni de ltar chos kyi dbyings rtogs shing /
T03D3807-1:198b-12: chos kyi dga' ba'i nyams su myong ba'i tshe lus
T03D3807-1:198b-13: dang sems shin tu sbyangs shing bsam gtan la las
T03D3807-1:198b-14: su rung ba'o // ting nge 'dzin ni chos kyi dbyings su sems rtse gcig tu gnas pa'o //
T03D3807-1:198b-15: btang snyoms ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis zil gyis
T03D3807-1:198b-16: mi non par chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa la sems
T03D3807-1:198b-18: chos bdun po de dag chos kyi dbyings byang chub
T03D3807-1:198b-19: kyi rang bzhin de rtogs par bya ba'i yan lag
T03D3807-1:198b-20: yang dag pa yin pa'i phyir yang dag byang chub
T03D3807-1:198b-22: dben pa la gnas pa dang ;
T03D3807-1:198b-23: 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa dang /
T03D3807-1:198b-25: rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa ni /
T03D3807-1:198b-26: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i skabs su bshad pa bzhin no //
T03D3807-1:198b-27: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
T03D3807-1:198b-28: chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar 'phags
T03D3807-1:198b-29: pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ste zhes bya ba
T03D3807-1:198b-30: la sogs pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
T03D3807-1:198b-31: pa theg pa chen po yin par bstan pa ste
T03D3807-1:198b-32: / 'phags pa nyan thos rgyun du zhugs pa yan chad dang /
T03D3807-1:198b-33: byang chub sems dpa' sa dang po thob pa yan
T03D3807-1:198b-34: chad 'phags pa rnams bsgom pa'i lam gyis spang bar
T03D3807-1:198b-35: bya ba'i nyon mongs pa phra mo rnams spang bar
T03D3807-1:198b-36: bya ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i sa thob
T03D3807-1:198b-37: par bya ba'i phyir yang dag pa'i lta ba la
T03D3807-1:199a-0: 'di rnams bsgoms pas nyon mongs pa phra mo rnams spangs shing @199a * //
T03D3807-1:199a-1: rnam par grol ba'i 'bras bu 'thob pa'i rgyu'am /
T03D3807-1:199a-2: lam yin pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya'o //
T03D3807-1:199a-3: de la yang dag pa'i lta ba ni 'jig rten pa'i log par lta ba spangs nas /
T03D3807-1:199a-4: shes rab kyi mig gis chos kyi dbyings phyin ci ma log par mthong ba'o //
T03D3807-1:199a-5: yang dag pa'i rtog pa ni chos kyi dbyings nyid
T03D3807-1:199a-6: la phyin ci ma log par rtogs shing gtan la
T03D3807-1:199a-7: 'bebs pa'o // yang dag pa'i ngag ni chos kyi
T03D3807-1:199a-8: dbyings rtogs pa'i rgyus brdzun du smra ba pa sogs
T03D3807-1:199a-9: pa log pa'i tshig rnams mi 'byung zhing chos nyid
T03D3807-1:199a-10: dang mi 'gal ba'i tshig gis gzhan la chos ston
T03D3807-1:199a-11: 'bebs pa'o // pa'o // yang dag pa'i las kyi
T03D3807-1:199a-12: mtha' ni tshul khrims la skyon med pas mi bya
T03D3807-1:199a-13: ba'i las rnams mi byed pa'o //
T03D3807-1:199a-14: yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba ni 'dod pa chung zhing
T03D3807-1:199a-15: chog shes pa tsam sgyu la sogs pa log pas
T03D3807-1:199a-17: yang dag pa'i rtsol ba'i bsgom pa'i lam gyis spang
T03D3807-1:199a-18: bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams spang bar bya
T03D3807-1:199a-19: ba dang de'i gnyen po sgom pa la brtson pa'o
T03D3807-1:199a-20: // yang dag pa'i dran pa ni bsgom pa'i lam
T03D3807-1:199a-21: gyis spang bar bya ba'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa
T03D3807-1:199a-22: // bying ba dang / rgod pa gnyis kyi dbang

T03D3807-1:202b-6: de la lung gi chos ni zhal nas gsungs pa'i

T03D3807-1:202b-8: ste / de dag gi yon tan dang /
T03D3807-1:202b-10: thob par bya ba'i chos ni /
T03D3807-1:202b-11: rgyun du zhugs pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu bzhi dang /

T03D3807-1:202b-27: sems can don bya ba'i tshul khrims so //

T03D3807-1:203a-0: @203a * // gtong ba rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba ni gtong ba la rnam pa gsum ste /

T03D3807-1:203b-19: gyi gzugs rnams la rnam par bam pa dang /
T03D3807-1:203b-20: rnam par bsngos pa la sogs par lta zhing mi
T03D3807-1:203b-21: sdug pa sgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin grub pa la
T03D3807-1:203b-22: gzugs rnams mthong ba zhes bya'o //

T03D3807-1:203b-28: mi byed par phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la rnam
T03D3807-1:203b-30: rnam par bsngos pa la sogs par 'du shes shing bsam gtan sgom pa'o //
