T03D3807-1:325b-22: bstan pa'o // pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs
T03D3807-1:325b-23: pa'i sku gdung rnams te zhes bya ba nas shes
T03D3807-1:325b-24: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang de bzhin
T03D3807-1:325b-25: gshegs pa gnyis su ma mchis te /
T03D3807-1:325b-26: gnyis su bgyir mchis so zhes bya ba'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /
T03D3807-1:325b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams mchod par 'os
T03D3807-1:325b-28: par gyur pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3807-1:325b-29: phyin pa las byung ba'i phyir mchod par 'os par
T03D3807-1:325b-30: gyur la de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
T03D3807-1:325b-31: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la mchod pa byed pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
T03D3807-1:325b-32: rigs kyi bu mo de dag kyang ngan song du
T03D3807-1:325b-33: mi ltung zhing mtho ris kyi longs spyod myong nas
T03D3807-1:325b-34: theg pa gsum gyis yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar
T03D3807-1:325b-35: 'gyur na / de dag 'byung ba'i rgyu shes rab
T03D3807-1:325b-36: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod cing rim
T03D3807-1:325b-37: gro byas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
T03D3807-1:325b-38: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba
T03D3807-1:325b-39: ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang 'dra ba'i
T03D3807-1:325b-41: bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gang de bzhin gshegs pa
T03D3807-1:325b-42: dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
T03D3807-1:325b-43: kyi cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum la zhugs te zhes
T03D3807-1:325b-44: bya ba la sogs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas
T03D3807-1:325b-45: gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis bshad pa dang /
T03D3807-1:325b-46: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung zhing kun chub par byas te /
T03D3807-1:326a-0: @326a * // gzhan la bstan pa'i bsod nams dang yon tan mtshungs par 'gyur ba'i phan yon bstan pa ste /
T03D3807-1:326a-1: de la cho 'phrul gsum ni gzhan gyi yid la
T03D3807-1:326a-2: ci sems pa mkhyen nas de dang rjes su mthun
T03D3807-1:326a-4: rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams yid ches par bya ste chos ston pa dang /
T03D3807-1:326a-5: bden pa gnyis kyi sgo nas chos thams cad gtan
T03D3807-1:326a-6: la dbab par bkrol te gdams pa dang tshar bcad
T03D3807-1:326a-7: pa'i tshul gyis phan pa la gzud pa dang gnod
T03D3807-1:326a-8: pa las bzlog pa'i phyir chos ston pa ste /
T03D3807-1:326a-9: rnam pa 'di gsum ngo mtshar che zhing rmad du
T03D3807-1:326a-10: byung bas sems can mang po dad cing 'dun par
T03D3807-1:326a-11: mdzad pas na cho 'phrul gsum zhes bya'o //
T03D3807-1:326a-12: bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang shar phyogs kyi de bzhin
T03D3807-1:326a-13: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
T03D3807-1:326a-14: sangs rgyas dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni
T03D3807-1:326a-15: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang g'a'i klung
T03D3807-1:326a-16: gi bye ma snyed kyis cho 'phrul gsum la gnas
T03D3807-1:326a-17: te / gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis bshad pa dang /
T03D3807-1:326a-18: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las
T03D3807-1:326a-19: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la
T03D3807-1:326a-20: bzung zhing kun chub par byas te /
T03D3807-1:326a-21: gzhan la bstan pa gnyis bsod nams mtshungs par 'gyur ba'i phan yon bstan pa'o //
T03D3807-1:326a-22: bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re
T03D3807-1:326a-23: zhing gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig
T03D3807-1:326a-24: rten gyi khams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
T03D3807-1:326a-25: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag
T03D3807-1:326a-27: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
T03D3807-1:326a-28: 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
T03D3807-1:326a-29: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
T03D3807-1:326a-30: so zhes bya ba'i bar du ni phyogs bcu'i phyogs
T03D3807-1:326a-31: re re zhing lang de bzhin gshegs pa gang g'a'i
T03D3807-1:326a-32: klung gi bye ma snyed la mchod pa sna tshogs
T03D3807-1:326a-33: byas pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3807-1:326a-34: phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris te mchod pa
T03D3807-1:326a-35: sna tshogs byas pa gnyis bsod nams mtshungs par 'gyur
T03D3807-1:326a-37: bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi
T03D3807-1:326a-38: bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3807-1:326a-40: klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang /
T03D3807-1:326a-41: tshul bzhin yid la bgyid cing gzhan la yang rgya
T03D3807-1:326a-42: cher ston pa des ni sems can dmyal ba'i rgyud
T03D3807-1:326a-43: kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o zhes bya ba
T03D3807-1:326a-44: nas / nad thams cad rab tu sel ba'o zhes
T03D3807-1:326b-0: bya ba'i bar du ni shes rab @326b kyi pha
T03D3807-1:326b-1: rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba la
T03D3807-1:326b-2: sogs pa byed pa mi tha mal pa ma yin
T03D3807-1:326b-3: nas / gyi / sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba
T03D3807-1:326b-4: bsags pas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa
T03D3807-1:326b-5: yin par rig par bya ste /
T03D3807-1:326b-6: de ni ngan song rgyud gsum dang theg pa dman
T03D3807-1:326b-7: par mi ltung zhing 'jigs pa thams cad dang nad
T03D3807-1:326b-8: thams cad sel ba'i phan yon bstan pa'o //
T03D3807-1:326b-9: bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs bu
T03D3807-1:326b-10: mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3807-1:326b-11: 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang zhes bya ba nas
T03D3807-1:326b-12: / 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T03D3807-1:326b-13: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du
T03D3807-1:326b-14: ste zhes bya ba'i bar du ni shes rab kyi
T03D3807-1:326b-15: pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa
T03D3807-1:326b-16: la sogs pa byas na 'jigs pa med par 'gyur
T03D3807-1:326b-17: ba'i dpe mi phyug po rgyal po la bstan pa
T03D3807-1:326b-18: las blangs te bstan pa dang /
T03D3807-1:326b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung dang de bzhin gshegs
T03D3807-1:326b-20: pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la sogs pa
T03D3807-1:326b-21: yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las
T03D3807-1:326b-22: byung bar mchod pa'i gnas su gyur pa'i phyir de
T03D3807-1:326b-23: dag gang bas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3807-1:326b-24: phyin pa 'di nyid mchog tu gyur pa'i phan yon
T03D3807-1:326b-25: bstan pa'o // bcom ldan 'das grong ngam grong khyer ram /
T03D3807-1:326b-26: grong rdal lam zhes bya ba nas /
T03D3807-1:326b-27: 'jig rten gyi khams dar ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba
T03D3807-1:326b-28: dang 'dra bar blta'o zhes bya ba'i bar du ni
T03D3807-1:326b-29: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yul
T03D3807-1:326b-30: phyogs gang na bris te 'chang ba la sogs pa
T03D3807-1:326b-31: byed pa'i yul phyogs der mi'am mi ma yin pa
T03D3807-1:326b-32: la sogs pa'i gnod pa mi 'byung ba dang /
T03D3807-1:326b-33: 'dzin cing 'chang ba'i mi de theg pa gsum gyis
T03D3807-1:326b-34: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i skal ba can
T03D3807-1:326b-36: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di sems
T03D3807-1:326b-37: can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi don sgrub par mdzad
T03D3807-1:326b-38: pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3807-1:326b-39: pa 'di gang na bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
T03D3807-1:326b-40: de na sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa dang
T03D3807-1:326b-41: 'dra ba'i phan yon rnams bstan pa'o //
T03D3807-1:326b-43: dper na nor bu rin po che chen po mi
T03D3807-1:326b-44: dpogs rin chen bgyi ba mchis te zhes bya ba
T03D3807-1:326b-45: nas / bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol
T03D3807-1:326b-46: tu phyin pa 'di yang lha rdzas kyi nor bu
T03D3807-1:326b-47: rin po che chen po de dang 'dra bar yon
T03D3807-1:326b-48: tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa ste
T03D3807-1:327a-1: lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che de gang
T03D3807-1:327a-2: du bzhag pa'i sa phyogs der mi ma yin pa'i
T03D3807-1:327a-3: gnod pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa dang /
T03D3807-1:327a-4: nor bu rin po che de mthong na nad rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
T03D3807-1:327a-5: mi dge ba rnam pa sna tshogs med par 'gyur ba dang /
T03D3807-1:327a-6: nor bu rin po che de gang du bzhag par mun pa las snang bar 'gyur ba dang /
T03D3807-1:327a-7: tsha ba las bsil bar 'gyur pa dang /
T03D3807-1:327a-8: grang pa las dro bar 'gyur ba dang /
T03D3807-1:327a-9: sems can gdug pa rnams med par 'gyur ba dang /
T03D3807-1:327a-10: chu'i nang du bcug na yang chu'i rnyog ma thams cad dangs par 'gyur ba dang /
T03D3807-1:327a-11: nor bu rin po che de gos sna tshogs kyis
T03D3807-1:327a-12: dkris te chur bcug na yang nor bu rin po
T03D3807-1:327a-13: che de'i mthu dang byin gyis chu de gos de
T03D3807-1:327a-14: dang kha dog 'dra bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du
T03D3807-1:327a-15: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang
T03D3807-1:327a-16: sems can thams cad kyi gnod pa thams cad sel
T03D3807-1:327a-17: ba yin no zhes bstan pa'o //
T03D3807-1:327a-18: de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos lha'i dbang
T03D3807-1:327a-19: po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so zhes
T03D3807-1:327a-20: bya ba nas / 'dzam bu'i gling gi nor bu
T03D3807-1:327a-21: rin po che de dag gis ni lha rdzas kyi
T03D3807-1:327a-22: nor bu rin po che de'i grangs sam cha'am /
T03D3807-1:327a-24: dpe'am rgyur nye par mi 'gro'o zhes bya ba'i bar
T03D3807-1:327a-25: du ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3807-1:327a-26: yon tan phun sum tshogs pa'i dpe nor bu rin
T03D3807-1:327a-27: po che las blangs pa mi yul gyi nor bu
T03D3807-1:327a-28: rin po che phal ma yin gyi lha rdzas kyi
T03D3807-1:327a-29: nor bu rin po che ste /
T03D3807-1:327a-30: nor bu rin po che de phal las khyad par
T03D3807-1:327a-31: du 'phags pa bstan pas shes rab kyi pha rol
T03D3807-1:327a-32: tu phyin pa 'di yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
T03D3807-1:327a-33: phyin pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
T03D3807-1:327a-34: cad las khyad par du 'phags shing /
T03D3807-1:327a-35: sems can thams cad kyi don sgrub pa yin no zhes bstan pa'o //
T03D3807-1:327a-36: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T03D3807-1:327a-37: bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che de snod la la zhig tu stsal ba las /
T03D3807-1:327a-38: snod de nas byung yang snod de ni nor bu
T03D3807-1:327a-39: rin po che de'i yon tan gyis yad du mchi
T03D3807-1:327b-0: bar 'gyur te / @327b gzhan yang snod de la mos pa skyed do zhes bya ba nas /
T03D3807-1:327b-1: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de
T03D3807-1:327b-2: dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che'i
T03D3807-1:327b-3: snod de / de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T03D3807-1:327b-4: sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o zhes bya
T03D3807-1:327b-5: ba'i bar du ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3807-1:327b-6: phyin pa la sogs pa rtag tu btang snyoms la
T03D3807-1:327b-7: snod de / gnas pa dang / mi nyal ba'i
T03D3807-1:327b-8: chos nyid la thug gi bar gyi sangs rgyas kyi
T03D3807-1:327b-9: chos rnams kyi yon tan tshad med cing brjod kyis
T03D3807-1:327b-10: mi lang bas chos de dag gi gzhi dang snod
T03D3807-1:327b-11: du gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yang
T03D3807-1:327b-12: mchod par 'os pa yin na chos de dag nyid
T03D3807-1:327b-13: lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes nor bu rin po
T03D3807-1:327b-14: che'i snod las dpe blangs te shes rab kyi pha
T03D3807-1:327b-15: rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan che ba bstan pa'o
T03D3807-1:327b-16: snod de / gnas pa dang / // bcom ldan
T03D3807-1:327b-17: 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni
T03D3807-1:327b-18: pha rol tu phyin pa kun nas nyon mongs pa
T03D3807-1:327b-20: rnam par byang ba ma mchas pa'i snod de zhes bya ba nas /
T03D3807-1:327b-21: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das kyang /
T03D3807-1:327b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod
T03D3807-1:327b-23: pa mnga'o zhes bya ba'i bar du ni de bzhin
T03D3807-1:327b-24: gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag shes rab kyi pha
T03D3807-1:327b-25: rol tu phyin pa kun nas nyon mongs pa dang
T03D3807-1:327b-26: rnam par byang ba med pa dang /
T03D3807-1:327b-27: skye ba dang 'gag pa med pa dang /
T03D3807-1:327b-28: blang ba [?] dang dor ba med pa dang /
T03D3807-1:327b-29: dbri ba dang bsnan pa med pa dang /
T03D3807-1:327b-30: 'ong ba dang 'gro ba med pa dang /
T03D3807-1:327b-31: chos nyid kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa zab mo
T03D3807-1:327b-32: de lta bu'i snod dang gzhi yin zhing chos zab
T03D3807-1:327b-33: mo de lta bu'i bag chags yod pa'i phyir de
T03D3807-1:327b-34: bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das kyang sku gdung
T03D3807-1:327b-35: de dag la mchod pa'i gnas su gyur pa bstan
T03D3807-1:327b-36: pa'i sgo nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3807-1:327b-37: pa zab cing gnyis su med pa'i yon tan bstan
T03D3807-1:327b-38: pa'o // gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
T03D3807-1:327b-39: 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung
T03D3807-1:327b-40: gis byur bur yongs su bltams pa lta zhog gi
T03D3807-1:327b-42: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la yang rim gro dang /
T03D3807-1:327b-43: bkur sti dang phu dung dang mchod pa bgyis par
T03D3807-1:327b-44: 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du ni phyogs bcu'i
T03D3807-1:327b-45: 'jig rten gyi khams gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma
T03D3807-1:327b-46: snyed de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur
T03D3807-1:327b-47: bkang ste / mchod cing bkur sti byas pa bas /
T03D3807-1:328a-0: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung zhing bcangs pa la @328a * //
T03D3807-1:328a-1: sogs pa'i bsod nams dang phan yon che ba gtan tshigs dang bcas par bstan pa ste /
T03D3807-1:328a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams kyang shes rab
T03D3807-1:328a-3: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba yin
T03D3807-1:328a-4: la / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la mchod cing bkur sti byas pas ni /
T03D3807-1:328a-5: lha dang mi'i bde ba phun sum tshogs pa myong nas /
T03D3807-1:328a-6: dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma rdzogs par mya
T03D3807-1:328a-7: ngan las 'da' bar gyur pa tsam du zad kyi
T03D3807-1:328a-8: / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di

T03D3807-1:328a-10: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la sogs pa sangs

T03D3807-1:328a-12: [?] ba dang lha dang mi'i bde ba phun sum
T03D3807-1:328a-14: sems can yongs su smin par bya ste /
T03D3807-1:328a-15: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas /
T03D3807-1:328a-16: byang chub sems dpa'i sa la 'jug pa dang /
T03D3807-1:328a-17: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mngon par shes pa
T03D3807-1:328a-18: la sogs pa yongs su rdzogs par byed cing sangs
T03D3807-1:328a-19: rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro
T03D3807-1:328a-20: ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rgyu shin tu bstsags pa dang /
T03D3807-1:328a-21: lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang ldan la /
T03D3807-1:328a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la yang mchod cing bkur sti byas par 'gyur te /
T03D3807-1:328a-23: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3807-1:328a-24: bzung zhing bcangs pa la sogs pa'i phan yon ni
T03D3807-1:328a-25: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par
T03D3807-1:328a-26: 'gyur ba dang / bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun
T03D3807-1:328a-27: sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir che'i de bzhin gshegs
T03D3807-1:328a-28: pa'i sku gdung la mchod cing bkur sti byas pa
T03D3807-1:328a-29: ni bdag 'ba' zhig gi don du 'gyur bas /
T03D3807-1:328a-30: de lta ma yin no zhes bstan pa'o //
T03D3807-1:328a-31: bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
T03D3807-1:328a-32: khams tshad dang grangs ma mchis pa dag na zhes
T03D3807-1:328a-33: bya ba nas / de bas na rigs kyi bu'am
T03D3807-1:328a-34: rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3807-1:328a-35: phyin pa la spyod pa des chos nyid du sangs
T03D3807-1:328a-36: rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o zhes bya
T03D3807-1:328a-37: ba'i bar du ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3807-1:328a-38: phyin pa 'di bzung zhing bcad ba la sogs pa

T03D3807-1:328a-40: rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na

T03D3807-1:328a-42: bya ba nas / byas na / mthong ba dang
T03D3807-1:328a-43: / mchod pa byas par 'gyur ba'i phan yon bstan
T03D3807-1:328a-44: bya ba nas / byas na / mthong ba dang
T03D3807-1:328a-45: / pa ste / de la chos kyi sku ni

T03D3807-1:331a-18: mchod par bya ba lta ci smos zhes bya ba'i bar du ni /
T03D3807-1:331a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par sangs rgyas pas chos
T03D3807-1:331a-20: gang la mchod cing brten par bya snyam du dgongs
T03D3807-1:331a-21: na yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten te /
T03D3807-1:331a-22: bdag gis mngon par sangs rgyas par gyur pas /
T03D3807-1:331a-23: 'di nyid la ngas rim gro dang /
T03D3807-1:331a-24: bkur sti la sogs pa bya'o snyam du bsams te /
T03D3807-1:331a-26: nga las lhag pa su yang med de /
T03D3807-1:331a-27: nga lta bu yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rim gro dang /
T03D3807-1:331a-28: bkur sti bya bar sems na de las gzhan pa
T03D3807-1:331a-29: bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'dod pa
T03D3807-1:331a-31: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la zhugs pa rnams kyis mchod cing /
T03D3807-1:331a-32: bkur sti la sogs pa bya ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
T03D3807-1:331a-33: de lta bu'i don chen po gzigs nas /
T03D3807-1:331a-34: don de nyid dbang du bya ste /
T03D3807-1:331a-35: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la /
T03D3807-1:331a-36: mchod cing rim gro la sogs pa lhag par bya ba bstan pa'o //
T03D3807-1:331a-38: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni /
T03D3807-1:331a-39: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so zhes bya ba nas /
T03D3807-1:331a-40: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis /
T03D3807-1:331a-41: rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob bo 'thob bo //
T03D3807-1:331a-42: 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T03D3807-1:331a-43: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di theg pa gsum char gyi /
T03D3807-1:331a-45: de'i phyir [?] mchod cing bkur sti la sogs pa
T03D3807-1:331a-46: byas na bsod nams lhag par che'o zhes bstan pa'o
T03D3807-1:331a-47: // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'bum
T03D3807-1:331a-48: pa rgya cher bshad pa las le'u nyi shu gsum
